title: [Hanoi] C&B Specialist
description:
*** ABOUT KYBER NETWORK
Kyber Network (https://kyber.network) is an industry-leading blockchain company, providing cryptocurrency liquidity for the largest companies in the DeFi (decentralized finance), Metaverse, and NFT spaces. The company raised US$52M in its token sale in 2017, making it one of the largest cryptocurrency-based fundraising in history.
Two co-founders, Dr. Luu The Loi (Chairman) and Victor Tran Huy Vu (CEO), were honored in Asia’s Forbes 30 under 30 in the ‘Finance - Investment’ category by Forbes magazine in 2017 and have since established the company as a market leader. Dr. Luu The Loi also has a PhD in blockchain security technology, and is one of the 10 most prominent Innovators under 35 in the Technology field in the Asia Pacific region (Innovators Under 35 Asia Pacific) published by the MIT Technology Review.
Kyber has developed a family of products including:
KyberSwap: KyberSwap.com - Trade & Earn at the Best Rates in DeFi with our leading Decentralized Exchange (DEX) Aggregator that does >US$1B in monthly trading volume
KyberDAO: Kyber.org - Be part of the community governing Kyber Network to shape the future of DeFi and earn $KNC tokens
And many more stealth developments and ventures that the company has taken stake in.
Kyber Network has offices in Singapore, Hanoi, and Ho Chi Minh City:
Singapore office: 1 Upper Circular Road, #05-01 Singapore 058400
Hanoi office: 6th floor, Comatce Tower, 61 Nguy Nhu Kon Tum, Thanh Xuan, Hanoi, Vietnam
Ho Chi Minh city office: 11th floor, Dreamplex Co-Working Space, Miss Ao Dai Building, 21 Nguyen Trung Ngan, Ben Nghe Ward, District 1, HCMC, Vietnam
Join our team of brilliant and committed professionals pursuing the goal of creating a “Decentralized Economy for Everyone” based on blockchain technology.
Are you ready to take up the challenge of creating world-changing innovations in the next decade? Apply now.
*** JOB DESCRIPTION
Responsibilities:
Employment data & reporting:
Ensure that all personnel information is recorded sufficiently, accurately and updated in the Company database platforms (offline and online)
Prepare multiple employment contracts for employees; and keep track of those contracts status corresponding to employee status updates
Execute the process steps during the employee’s journey: onboarding, promotion, rotation, offboarding, etc.
Produce respective C&B reports on a periodical basis or when requested ad-hoc by stakeholders.
Payroll:
Produce the monthly payroll, ensuring its accuracy and timeline
Coordinate with Accounting team regarding the payroll process to ensure timely and accurately remittance to employees.
Personal income tax (PIT):
Register PIT code & PIT dependant for new employees
Complete monthly/quarterly PIT declaration reports
Implement the annual PIT finalization for eligible employees following the updated timeline and regulations.
Social, healthcare & unemployment insurance (SHUI):
Ensure that the operation of SHUI in accordance with the regulations and company’s policies, including registration, contribution, reporting, claim.
Premium Healthcare Insurance program for employees and family members:
Work with employees and Insurance partner to ensure the program’s efficient operations, including registration, reporting, claim.
Others:
Timely update the Government’s circulars and decrees on wages, SHUI & PIT to propose the updates on the implementation of the salary regime
Assist in development and administration of compensation strategy and company recognition programs.
Perform other tasks or initiatives that are directed by Head of People Operations.
Requirements:
Must have:
Bachelor’s degree in HR, finance, accounting, or other related majors
Around 4+ years of C&B working experience
Deep knowledge of Vietnamese Labor Law, PIT and SHUI Law and other related regulations
Strong MS Word, Excel, data analytic & reporting skills. Tech-savvy enough to quickly adapt to new database/collaboration platforms (like Notion, Slack. etc.)
Good communication skills in Vietnamese and writing skills in English
Good logical thinking and problem-solving skills
Strong attention to detail, great collaboration skills and high integrity.
Nice to have:
Previous work experience in a technology company is an advantage
Prior experience of working with HR software and Performance management systems is preferred.
*** WHAT WE CAN OFFER
Vietnam - based benefits here

title: Teacher of Physical Education
description:
British International School Hanoi is looking to appoint a Teacher of Physical Education, to join our talented and dedicated team of educators from August 2023.
For those who can make it, interviews will be conducted in London by the Head of Secondary between 10-12 January 2023. There will also be an online alternative for all other applicants.
Our school
BIS Hanoi is a positive, thriving learning community, committed to educational excellence based on the most rigorous of global standards, where students from over 31 nationalities are highly motivated to learn and achieve. The Secondary School provides an enriched learning experience inspired by the English National Curriculum from Years 7-9, leading into the International General Certificate of Secondary Education (IGCSE) in Year 10-11, and the International Baccalaureate Diploma Programme (IBDP) in Years 12-13.
As a Nord Anglia Education school, BIS Hanoi is superbly resourced, with excellent facilities and technology supporting holistic learning, leading to exceptional educational outcomes in all areas. With 1100 students, BIS Hanoi continues to grow and is an energetic, welcoming environment with exciting opportunities for collaboration and professional growth.
Hanoi itself is rich in culture and history with exciting travel opportunities both within Vietnam and regionally, and nature at its doorstep. The outstanding benefits package provides teachers with an excellent lifestyle and large saving potential, and includes quality housing, medical insurance, flights, gym membership, transportation, and settling allowance.
To learn more about our school and see our latest updates, please view the Employment section and the News and Events section of our website, and our Facebook page.

The role
The Physical Education (PE) department is an exciting place to both teach and learn. We offer engaging curricula across Primary and Secondary, focusing on a concept and skills-based approach. Our students learn through a variety of sports and activities and are encouraged to apply their skills to different activities, situations and scenarios. Students can also study IGCSE Physical Education in Years 10 and 11, whilst our IBDP students have the option of Sport, Exercise and Health Science. Both are popular courses for our examination students.
The PE team consists of five full-time PE teaching staff, one Science member of staff for IB SEHS and two teaching assistants. We also have a Director of Sport and Activities that works alongside our Head of Whole-school PE. We are committed to excellence in all sporting endeavours and are immensely proud of our high quality co-curricular program.
The ideal candidate will have the ability to plan and deliver high quality lessons that engage, motivate, and challenge students of all abilities, and come with innovative, enriching ideas, as well as being a strong team-player who willing to get involved in sports around the school. The candidate should be able to teach both primary and secondary, developing the fundamental skills needed in the lower years and build on them as students' progress and develop.
Our teachers
Deliver outstanding teaching and learning so that every student is challenged, makes progress, and thrives in a safe, inclusive, and stimulating learning environment.
Commit to knowing students well, ensuring that learning is personalised so students can confidently take their own next step in their learning journey.
Continually look for opportunities for innovation, trying new strategies in the classroom, contributing to a culture of experimentation and risk-taking.
Always promote wellbeing of students, and proactively safeguard students according to school safeguarding policies and procedures.
Skillfully integrate educational technology into practice, selecting the most appropriate tools to enhance the learning experience.
International school experience, particularly an IB background, is desired but not a necessity to apply.

For further details about teacher expectations please see job description attached

Nord Anglia Education
BIS Hanoi is a Nord Anglia Education school and is part of a global community of approximately 13,000 people working together in 81 schools located in 32 countries around the world. Together, we educate over 70,000 students globally from ages 2 to 18 across China, Southeast Asia, the Middle East, The Americas and Europe.
Through unique collaborations with The Juilliard School and the Massachusetts Institute of Technology (MIT), you will also get unrivalled access to world leading experts in the performing arts and STEAM subjects (Science, Technology, Engineering, Arts and Maths). Also, our collaboration with King’s College London, exclusive to Nord Anglia staff, gives you a chance to earn your Executive Master’s in International Education.

To Apply

The closing date for application is Thursday 12 January, although we reserve the right to interview and make an appointment before the advertised closing date for the role. Therefore, an early application is recommended.
Interviews: will be conducted online
Start Date: August 2023
At Nord Anglia Education we are committed to providing a world-class, safe, happy environment in which children and young people can thrive and learn. We are committed to safeguarding and promoting the welfare of all our pupils irrespective of race, ability, religion, gender, or culture.
All post holders in regulated activity (having regular unsupervised contact with children) are subject to appropriate national and international vetting procedures including satisfactory criminal record checks from both your country of residence/birth and any country of residence within the last 10 years.
We are an equal opportunities employer, and we welcome applications from all suitably qualified persons.

Please note that you are wholly responsible for fact checking in respect of the information provided by schools. Please also check for the latest visa and work permit requirements that may apply. Tes is not responsible for the content of advertisements or the policies adopted by advertising schools. Tes asks that all schools follow Tes' Fair Recruitment Policy.

title: [EAS1] Software Project Manager (SW PCM, COEM)
description:
Company Description

The Bosch Group is a leading global supplier of technology and services. In 2013, its roughly 281,000 associates generated sales of 46.4 billion Euros. Since the beginning of 2013, its operations have been divided into four business sectors: Automotive Technology, Industrial Technology, Consumer Goods, and Energy and Building Technology.
The Bosch Group comprises Robert Bosch GmbH and its roughly 360 subsidiaries and regional companies in some 50 countries. If its sales and service partners are included, then Bosch is represented in roughly 150 countries. This worldwide development, manufacturing, and sales network is the foundation for further growth
Bosch Global Software Technologies Company Limited (BGSV) is 100% owned subsidiary of Robert Bosch GmbH.
BGSV has started its operations from 19th October, 2010 at e-Town2 in HCMC. This engineering development center will be engaged in developing embedded systems and software, mechanical design and simulation, and will provide IT (SAP Consulting, JAVA Development….) and Business Services (Finance and accounting, Economics, Purchasing, Logistics, Translations Japanese-English-Japanese, Information Security ) solutions to the Bosch group of companies globally.

Job Description

Our vision is to be THE software engineering partner for brake system in ASEAN. We deliver complete software projects (CSPs) to our Bosch counterparts of CC, BEG and 2WP divisions for the OEMs in nearshore regions Japan, China, ASAEAN. We perform the end-to-end software development activities including all the roles like developers, testers, integrators, project managers and other special functions like functional safety and cyber security for our projects. We also work on the advanced engineering topics like software engineering for E&E architecture.
“Join us in this noble cause of saving lives and develop your careers towards these futuristic technologies”.
We would like to offer an opportunity for an experienced Software Project Manager:
Join the software development of the latest generation of braking system control unit for a well-known Chinese leading car-makers
Work directly with top automotive experts from Bosch China, India and Germany
Exposure to state-of-the-art technologies in Automotive industry
Your main responsibilities:
Interface with customers and other stakeholders as the contact point for software part of the product from acquisition phase until final release
Be responsible for managing the project schedule and deliverables within defined Q-C-D
Analyze customer requirements, clarify and document with the support of development team
Issue development request to developers and track the progress
Develop the team and give feedback to associates as per need

Qualifications

Mandatory Requirements
Bachelor or Master degree in Automotive Engineering/ Computer Engineering/ Electrical-Electronics/ Electronics-Telecommunication/ Mechatronics Engineering or related fields
Have experience in the field of Embedded Software Development
Strong at project management, risk management
Have knowledge of microcontroller and microprocessors
Strong understanding of V-model development process
Good English verbal and written communication skills
Great project leadership and team work spirit
Desirable Skills:
Exposure in Automotive Industry with knowledge about In-Vehicle Communication, Vehicle Dynamics, Automotive Safety Standards,...
PMP certificate or equivalent
Chinese language skills is great advantage

Additional Information

WHY BOSCH?
Because we don't just follow trends, we create them.
Because together we turn ideas into reality, working every day to make the world of tomorrow a better place. Do you have high standards when it comes to your job? So do we. At Bosch, you will discover more than just work.
Working in one of the Best Places to Work in Vietnam and Top 30 of the Most Innovative Companies all over the world
Join a dynamic and fast growing global company (English-speaking environment)
13th-month salary bonus + attractive performance bonus (you'll love it!) + annual performance appraisal
100% monthly salary and mandatory social insurances in 2-month probation
Onsite opportunities: short-term and long-term assignments
15++ days of annual leave + 1 day of birthday leave
Premium health insurance for employee and 02 family members
Flexible working time
Lunch and parking allowance
Various training on hot-trend technologies/ foreign language (English/Chinese/Japanese) and soft-skills
Fitness & sport activities: football, badminton, yoga, Aerobic
Free in-house entertainment facilities and snack
Join in various team building, company trip, year-end party, tech talks and a lot of charity events

title: Trưởng Phòng Quản Trị Hệ Thống Mạng
description:
Bouygues Construction Information Technologies (BYCN IT) is the IT branch of Bouygues Construction, a global player in the building, civil works, energies and services sectors. Bouygues Construction operates at all points of the value chain of projects: finance, design, construction and facilities management (operation and maintenance). On every continent, our employees devise and develop solutions that help improve the environment and everybody's lives.
As part of Bouygues Construction, the mission of BYCN IT is to provide the members of Bouygues Construction with IT services of high quality fitting with their businesses and to deploy solutions to improve communication and people collaboration through worldwide network. BYCN IT has offices in France, Morocco and Vietnam.
We are looking forward to cooperating with talented and motivated people.
Job Description

- Ensure all assigned IT tasks are professionally undertaken and that the IT system remains in good condition and runs perfectly
- Have a responsible for all IT technical aspects of the company

- Build services relationship with users data center teamsand understand the principles and practice of client care

- 15+ years working experience

- Strong background on System/Network/Security

- Knowledge of the latest technology innovations

Highly desirable:
- Exchange server

- Citrix
- SCCM/SCOM
- MS SQL database server
- Backup and storage solutions

- Advance in French

General Skills

- Excellent planning, organizing and time management skills with the ability to multi-task
- Strict and methodic
- Proactive / Agile mindset
- Well-organized
- Good teamwork and autonomy
- Cares about delivery quality
Deadlines for submission: 04/11/2022
Benefit
- Salary Range : Competitive
- Compulsory Insurance and additional medical insurance (Vietnam Care)
- International, friendly and people-oriented environment
- Team building events and company trip every year; Sport, personal activites sponsor
- Possibilities Work From Home
- Career opportunities in the one of biggest group in the world
- Training and continuous investment into your professional development.

Salary: 40,000,000₫ - 60,000,000₫ per month
Ability to commute/relocate:
Ho Chi Minh City: Reliably commute or planning to relocate before starting work (Preferred)

title: Business Analyst English/Agile
description:
Mô tả công việc:
(Mức lương: Thỏa thuận)
You will work as a Business Analyst in an Agile environment.
Envision initial requirements and support creating initial project scope.
Participate in product prototyping, mock-up, and GUI design.
Gather, analyze, and translate business needs into user stories and acceptance criteria.
Validate and verify implemented user stories based on acceptance criteria.
Support the creation, maintenance of project documentation and estimation of new projects.
Keep up to date with new trends and best practices in business analysis and share knowledge with colleagues.

Yêu cầu công việc:

Experience with non-functional aspects, i.e. security, performance, and scalability. Can speak German.

title: Hourly Lecturer/Associate Lecturer, Hospitality and Tourism Management
description:
Overview:
RMIT VIETNAM
RMIT Vietnam, an entity of RMIT University, has campuses in Ho Chi Minh City and Hanoi since 2001. We provide internationally recognized, high-quality education and professional training for students, clients, and the community, and assist in the development of human resources capability in Vietnam and the region by hosting students from Australia and many other countries.
THE SCHOOL OF BUSINESS AND MANAGEMENT
RMIT Vietnam’s School of Business and Management has established a reputation for excellence in business and management education, providing high quality, industry responsive programs relevant to the national and global marketplace. The Management Department, within the School, has six discipline areas. Our business programs offer fresh perspectives on business problems and we inspire our students to think, challenge and create.
We deliver work ready graduates. In today’s competitive environment, professionals need the skills to adapt to an ever-changing business world. With RMIT Vietnam's close partnerships with industry, our students are engaged with some of industry’s top business people, receiving knowledge and skills aligned directly with their specific career paths. At RMIT Vietnam, we give our students the skills to address real-world business issues.
THE ROLE
As an hourly rate Lecturer your main responsibility will be to teach subjects relating to tourism and hospitality management. You will teach on undergraduate and, potentially, Masters programs. You will actively promote the program by establishing and maintaining memberships, linking and partnering with academic, industry and professional communities.
OUR REQUIREMENTS
Available to start February 2022 (Semester 1) based in HCMC
Master Degree (for Associate Lecturer) or Ph.D. (for Lecturer level) hourly rate positions - Tourism and Hospitality Management discipline or equivalent relevant qualification
Proven teaching experience in the area of food and beverage management - broadly defined, including restaurant management, food production management, beverage management, food safety, and restaurant related technology and systems – is desirable.
Industry or professional experience.
Excellent team player
Culturally agile.
Broad and in-depth knowledge of the disciplines mentioned above, specifically in the area of Food and Beverage Management and Hospitality discipline

SALARY SCALE
The hourly rate you receive is based on an “actual working hour”.
For every hour of teaching, you will be paid for two hours. The two hours related to 1-hour teaching and 1 hour of lesson preparation, marking, and administration.
BENEFITS INCLUDE:
Competitive hourly rate plus health insurance.
Flexible hours
Free access to the on-site international medical centre
World-class teaching facilities and resources
Personal Accident Insurance coverage
FOR FURTHER INFORMATION
For more information, please click on the following link:
Hourly Academic FAQ's.pdf
Lecturer_THM July 2020.pdf

HOW TO APPLY
Please click on the ‘Apply ’ button.
Applications Close:
3 thg 2 2023 11.59 pm
RMIT University Vietnam (RMIT Vietnam) is a campus of RMIT University. RMIT Vietnam is creating an innovative research, teaching and learning culture. We are committed to providing internationally recognised high-quality education and professional training for our students, clients and members of the community. As an internationally recognised Australian university based in Asia, RMIT Vietnam is assisting in the development of human resources capability in Vietnam and the region.
https://www.rmit.edu.vn/about-us

title: Delivery Manager_Outsourcing Service
Accounting and Office Admin
description:
We are a team of passionate software engineers, product managers and designers that enjoy building outstanding web and mobile applications.
Millions of people use our apps. We work for companies of all sizes; from 1-person startups to Fortune 500 enterprises. We take a collaborative and product development approach, creating custom software that people will love to use and solving our clients' problems so that they can focus on what they do best - better.

If you want to grow together, work in a challenging but rewarding environment, Nimble is the right place for you! We keep our recruitment process practical and straightforward.
What you will do
Record and manage all transactions/expenses including bank transfers, credit card expenses, petty cash, and reimbursements;
Summarize payroll information including salary, reimbursements, social security, personal income tax, and trade union fee; calculate monthly payroll;
Gather all invoices and related documents and submit to the Accounting Service Firm for the further process;
Contact the bank for needed procedures regarding bank accounts and credit card;
Coordinate with the Accounting Service Firm for other accounting procedures.
Take care of office maintenance including paperwork with authorities, office lease, and all the supplies required for a comfortable working environment;
Purchase equipment for new joiners and monitor all assets of the company;
Advise the team about procedures related to social security, PIT, and healthcare insurance and support them with registration, document preparation, and submission;
Search for and negotiate with diverse vendors to get the best deal;
Travel arrangements such as air ticket and hotel booking;
Visa, work permit, and temporary resident card for foreigners;
What challenges you will have
We have operations in Vietnam and Thailand so from time to time you will coordinate with colleagues from our other offices and assist them when required.
We have a fast-growing team composed mainly Vietnamese (in HCMC office), foreign nationals (> 10 nationalities in Bangkok) and ambitious plans for expansion.
There is a lot of room for you to learn and grow in this role. We are open to new initiatives and processes to improve the way we operate.
Why work with us
You will be proud of any product that has our name on it.
We are an engineering-focused company. Both co-founders are software engineers and led the tech teams at the most prominent e-commerce powerhouses in South East Asia.
We really pay attention and care about processes, high quality, and aesthetics.
Strong processes. We not only believe but also really work following agile principles. Developers work on well-sized and well-defined user stories, do estimate using points and work iteratively in short sprints (1-2 weeks).
Regular one-on-one reviews to constantly improve and grow. We have a clearly defined process for our developers to level up continuously not only their technical skills but also soft skills.
The vast amount of learning resources (Pluralsight, Pragpub, Leanpub, (e-)books, etc.) and yearly education allowance to step up your game.
Nimble Growth session to invest time in acquiring new skills and to work on new technology.
Private medical insurance (Liberty) from day one, company care fund and social welfare coverage.
Great equipment consisting of a MacBook, large screens in the office. Our equipment is renewed every 3 years.
Casual work attire for everyone.
Comfortable and modern office space environment in the heart of Ho Chi Minh City and Da Nang.
Our office kitchen is fully stocked with drinks and snacks for the team.
26 days of paid leaves/year (11 public holidays + 15 personal days).
Sabbatical month every 3 years.
Company outing every year.
And many more perks! Check it out here!
Requirements
At least 3 years of experience in Business Administration/Accounting.
Excellent spoken and written English.
Strong sense of organization and prioritization.
High attention to detail.
Experience in Vietnam’s Labor Law is essential.
A driven and self-starter attitude.
An open mind, a desire to learn, and to find new ways to do better what we do. You strive to improve every day.
Tech savvy and curious, has experience working in technology companies is a big advantage, and usage of modern tools is preferred.
Very resourceful to solve inquiries.
Only Vietnamese nationals are considered for this role.

title: Production Manager
description:
NIC’s Client
Job Description
Production Manager – CNC, Precision
Job Description
Responsibilities
Reports to
– VP/ President
Responsibilities
– Compliance to company ISO requirements, safety regulations when executing tasks
– Monitor timeline of product and customer needs, ensuring timeline are met
– Evaluate and improve on processes in manufacturing environment
– Arrange for the planning process in CNC machine
– Maintain reliable and safe manufacturing systems while improving production rates, efficiencies, yields, costs and changeovers.
– Develop innovative solutions.
– Improve process capability and production volume while maintaining and improving quality standards.
– Prepare training procedure to guide employees processing technology
– Perform FMEA when required
– Conduct and validate processes when required
– Maintain testing equipment.
– Develop and implement system that optimize all phases of production process.
– Provide suggestions during incident investigations.
– Advise on corrective actions.
– Design new equipment, processes, procedures and systems.
– Investigate production problems.
– Make improvements to current operations to enhance efficiency.
– Liaise with suppliers, customers, and research and development staff.
– Determine project specifications by studying product design, customer requirements and performance standards; completing technical studies; preparing cost estimates.
– Prepare project status reports by collecting, analyzing, and summarizing information and trends; recommending actions.
– Maintain safe and clean working environment by enforcing procedures, rules, and regulations.
– Maintain product and company reputation by complying with customer requirement.
– Contribute to team effort by accomplishing related results as needed.
– Perform additional tasks given from time to time from VP / President
– Attend meetings when needed
Required skills
Requirement - Minimum 3 years’ experience in manufacturing industry. - Preferably mechanical inclined - Minimum 3 years’ experience in manufacturing industry. - Preferably mechanical inclined - God knowledge of Processes in a Precision Machining environment - Knowledge and application in operating various Precision Machines such as CNC machining, turning, - Grinding, etc. - The ability to work well under pressure. - Problem-solving skills. - Team working skills. - Relevant technical knowledge. - Good leadership skills.

Millions of people use our apps. We work for companies of all sizes; from 1-person startups to Fortune 500 enterprises. We take a collaborative and product development approach, creating custom software that people will love to use and solving our clients' problems so that they can focus on what they do best - better.

If you want to grow together, work in a challenging but rewarding environment, Nimble is the right place for you! We keep our recruitment process practical and straightforward.
What you will do
Record and manage all transactions/expenses including bank transfers, credit card expenses, petty cash, and reimbursements;
Summarize payroll information including salary, reimbursements, social security, personal income tax, and trade union fee; calculate monthly payroll;
Gather all invoices and related documents and submit to the Accounting Service Firm for the further process;
Contact the bank for needed procedures regarding bank accounts and credit card;
Coordinate with the Accounting Service Firm for other accounting procedures.
Take care of office maintenance including paperwork with authorities, office lease, and all the supplies required for a comfortable working environment;
Purchase equipment for new joiners and monitor all assets of the company;
Advise the team about procedures related to social security, PIT, and healthcare insurance and support them with registration, document preparation, and submission;
Search for and negotiate with diverse vendors to get the best deal;
Travel arrangements such as air ticket and hotel booking;
Visa, work permit, and temporary resident card for foreigners;
What challenges you will have
We have operations in Vietnam and Thailand so from time to time you will coordinate with colleagues from our other offices and assist them when required.
We have a fast-growing team composed mainly Vietnamese (in HCMC office), foreign nationals (> 10 nationalities in Bangkok) and ambitious plans for expansion.
There is a lot of room for you to learn and grow in this role. We are open to new initiatives and processes to improve the way we operate.
Why work with us
You will be proud of any product that has our name on it.
We are an engineering-focused company. Both co-founders are software engineers and led the tech teams at the most prominent e-commerce powerhouses in South East Asia.
We really pay attention and care about processes, high quality, and aesthetics.
Strong processes. We not only believe but also really work following agile principles. Developers work on well-sized and well-defined user stories, do estimate using points and work iteratively in short sprints (1-2 weeks).
Regular one-on-one reviews to constantly improve and grow. We have a clearly defined process for our developers to level up continuously not only their technical skills but also soft skills.
The vast amount of learning resources (Pluralsight, Pragpub, Leanpub, (e-)books, etc.) and yearly education allowance to step up your game.
Nimble Growth session to invest time in acquiring new skills and to work on new technology.
Private medical insurance (Liberty) from day one, company care fund and social welfare coverage.
Great equipment consisting of a MacBook, large screens in the office. Our equipment is renewed every 3 years.
Casual work attire for everyone.
Comfortable and modern office space environment in the heart of Ho Chi Minh City and Da Nang.
Our office kitchen is fully stocked with drinks and snacks for the team.
26 days of paid leaves/year (11 public holidays + 15 personal days).
Sabbatical month every 3 years.
Company outing every year.
And many more perks! Check it out here!
Requirements
At least 3 years of experience in Business Administration/Accounting.
Excellent spoken and written English.
Strong sense of organization and prioritization.
High attention to detail.
Experience in Vietnam’s Labor Law is essential.
A driven and self-starter attitude.
An open mind, a desire to learn, and to find new ways to do better what we do. You strive to improve every day.
Tech savvy and curious, has experience working in technology companies is a big advantage, and usage of modern tools is preferred.
Very resourceful to solve inquiries.
Only Vietnamese nationals are considered for this role.

title: Frontend Engineer (ReactJS/VueJS)
description:
About Naver and Naver Vietnam:
NAVER Co., Ltd. is South Korea's largest web search engine, as well as a global ICT brand that provides services including LINE messenger, currently with over 200 million users from around the world, the SNOW video app, the digital comics platform NAVER WEBTOON, a B2B communication platform headed towards the global market WORKS MOBILE, a leading market music app TUNE, a social platform BBOOM, NAVER SHOPPING provides the latest on trends, products and retail ... In 2018, NAVER was ranked as the 9th most innovative company in the world by Forbes and top 6th Future 50 company by Fortune magazine.
In 2021, NAVER VIETNAM expands its operations in the Information Technology market in two (2) largest cities of Vietnam, expanding the Global R&D Belt with HUST and PTIT in Ha Noi, establishing Naver Vietnam Development Center (NVDC) in Ho Chi Minh city and on process to set up another NVDC in Ha Noi with the goal of becoming one of the strongest development centers in Asia with 3 core values of: " Autonomy - Challenge - Teamwork".
In 2022, NAVER VIETNAM continues to enhance sponsorship for UIT students to learn high-quality programming courses. This year, we also open a new center named GWE Webtoon Operation Center to provide our comics lovers around the world with the best experiences.
We are looking for Senior Frontend Engineer.
Your daily tasks:
Develop Front End part of various NAVER Services like VLIVE, VIBE, Smart Place, NAVER Cloud etc.
Your background:
Background in computer science and/or engineering
Ideally, 3+ years of work experience on Front-end to serve large-scale and high-traffic projects
Proficient understanding of HTML/CSS/JS
Should have the knowledge of advanced JavaScript libraries, such as React, Vue
Good understanding of asynchronous request handling, partial page updates, AJAX, NodeJS, SSR
Deep knowledge and experience in Object-Oriented and functional programming
Deep knowledge and experience in applying Design Patterns
Experience in Data Structure, Algorithm, Distributed Service
Understand the importance of writing high Maintainable Code, Clean Code
Proficient understanding of Git (Experienced in merging, branching source code)
Experienced in setup and using Continuous Integration (Jenkins), Continuous Delivery and Infrastructure as Code
Open-minded, honest and have a positive attitude towards people
Good at communication skills in general and English skills in particular
No problem with business trips overseas

It's a big plus if you :
Have experience in Server Architecture Design for handling massive traffic
Have experience in System Analysis & Design, Micro Service Architectures
Have an understanding of cross-browser compatibility issues and ways to work around them.

From solid welfare programs to autonomy over working time and place, we create the culture in which we work. By joining NAVER VIETNAM, you will be involved in:
A work-life balance: A-class brand new offices located in the city center with flexible working option; Annual leave 14 days, add 1 day to every year.
Competitive income package: Performance appraisal every year, incentive bonus...
Learning and development opportunities: We provide annual budget for employee to learn anything related to languages and technologies & monthly budget for buying any books you want to read.
Protecting and enhancing healthcare plan for you and your family: We provide premium health insurance for employee and 2 family members, health-check every year and premium gym membership.
Employee 's engagement activities: You will be involved in a fun and respectful working environment, we support monthly budget for team engagement.
Other benefits: One-off allowance for setting up working from home corner, work dedication bonus.

title: Publicis VN I Account Executive
description:
Company Description

PUBLICIS – LEADING THE CHANGE
Publicis is an international agency that believes in brave work bringing positive impact to brands & consumers with big ATL & digital ideas. In a world of accelerated change in which new technologies emerge every day, Publicis Worldwide provides strategic creative ideas leveraged by data and technology to help clients succeed in their marketing transformation. In more than 110 countries, our agencies work with a wide range of clients and company cultures. But in our network, we all share a common ambition: to help our clients and their brands to be and remain the leaders they want to be, to Lead The Change.

Assist the Account Manager and other Team members in developing plans, briefs, reports, reviews, timelines, and estimates to ensure the successful implementation of the solution

1-2 years of relevant experience in digital, media, and creative agencies

With a “passion” for advertising

title: Character Art Director
description:
Location
Vietnam, Ho Chi Minh City - Sparx*
Department
ART
PLAY, GROW and WIN
To be a part of Virtuos means to be a creator and aim at excellence.
At Virtuos, we harness the latest technologies to make video games better and more immersive than ever before. That is why we pride ourselves in constantly pushing the boundaries of possibility since our founding in 2004.
Virtuosi are a team of experts – people who have come together to share their mutual passion for producing high-quality games. People who share the same enthusiasm in exploring new ideas and the constant drive to excel in their field. People who believe in earning success through dedication.
As a group, Virtuos has become a recognized leader in its field, has been growing faster than its peers have in recent years, and is pursuing an aggressive global expansion strategy. To this end, we are seeking an experienced Character Art Director who can join our team and help pave the way towards our new goals.

About the position
PLAY, GROW and WIN
To be a part of Virtuos means to be a creator and aim at excellence.
At Virtuos, we harness the latest technologies to make video games better and more immersive than ever before. That is why we pride ourselves in constantly pushing the boundaries of possibility since our founding in 2004.
Virtuosi are a team of experts – people who have come together to share their mutual passion for producing high-quality games. People who share the same enthusiasm in exploring new ideas and the constant drive to excel in their field. People who believe in earning success through dedication.
As a group, Virtuos has become a recognized leader in its field, has been growing faster than its peers have in recent years, and is pursuing an aggressive global expansion strategy. To this end, we are seeking an experienced Character Art Director who can join our team and help pave the way towards our new goals.
Responsibilities
Sparx*, one of the leading external partners in the CG industry, is seeking an adventurous Character Art Director who enjoys the challenges of traveling whilst also doing the work you love. We are looking for an accomplished artist with management experience to work with a group of young, dynamic, eager to learn artists, engaging with on the biggest client names in the movies and game industry! If this sounds like a fun challenge to you, join us on The Sparx* Side in Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam!

Base yourself in this dynamic city and literally go anywhere is South East Asia for the weekend.

Who we are looking for
We are seeking an experienced Character Art Director who has:
Managed a team of 3D / 2D model and texture artists to engage in Games Character / Creatures projects
Led the communication with clients about artistic and technical matters
Technical expertise to decide which technologies to pursue and which to avoid Establish Art production pipeline in coordination with clients
Ensured technical and artistic quality of deliverable
Proven ability to articulate a game project's art goals, and lead the team to meet objectives to fulfill those goals
Participated to recruitment and training of new talent

Additional Information
Relocation assistance and a range of benefits are offered
Salaries are competitive

ABOUT SPARX*
Established in 1995, Sparx* is Vietnam's premier Game Art and Animation studio, with over 500 full-time artists, animators and technical experts. Since 2011, Sparx* has been a member of Virtuos Group - one of the world's largest content production companies. For over two decades, the studio based in Ho Chi Minh City has contributed to the biggest AAA video games, highest-grossing Hollywood blockbuster movies, and award-winning TV series. More information at www.sparx.com

Qualifications
At least 5 years of leadership experience in the video game industry, managing teams of “creative geniuses” as either a Lead Artist, Senior Artist or Art Team Leader with hands-on technical experience.
Must have shipped a minimum of 1-2 AAA games
Mastery of common industry Software like 3D Studio Max or Maya, Photoshop, Zbrush, Substance Painter, Substance Designer, Marvelous designer
Knowledge of Unreal and Unity is required
Strong artistic aptitudes, ability to draw.
Experience creating and optimizing art pipelines
Excellent problem-solving, organizational, communication, interpersonal, presentation, and mentorship skills
Great level of English communication is a must
Position Name
Character Art Director

title: Azure Cloud Solution Architect (Quản lý Kiến trúc Giải pháp Đám mây)
description:
Prudential's purpose is to help people get the most out of life. We will deliver our purpose by creating a culture in which diversity is celebrated and inclusion assured, for our colleagues, customers, and partners. We provide a platform for our people to do their best work and make an impact to the business, and in exchange, we support our people's career ambitions. We pledge to make Prudential a place where you can Connect, Grow and Succeed.
This role is to design cloud architectures for cloud native modernized applications, using MS Azure cloud services.
(Vai trò này là thiết kế kiến trúc đám mây cho các ứng dụng hiện đại sử dụng dịch vụ đám mây MS Azure).
Job Responsibilities:
Owning MS Azure Cloud Architecture Design Engagement:
Work with IT infrastructure & cloud services team, IT security team, and development center of execution team to lead deep technical architecture discussions with Enterprise Architects.
Làm việc với nhóm hạ tầng CNTT & dịch vụ đám mây, nhóm Bảo mật CNTT và nhóm phát triển phần mềm để dẫn dắt các cuộc thảo luận sâu về kiến trúc kỹ thuật với Kiến trúc doanh nghiệp.
Collaborate with a variety of teams to develop MVP and oversee implementation projects, ensuring technical blockers are removed on adoption
Cộng tác với nhiều nhóm khác nhau để phát triển dự án theo MVP và giám sát triển khai dự án, đảm bảo loại bỏ các chặn kỹ thuật khi áp dụng
Collaborate with Product Owner and Scrum Master to share feedback into the development of in-house products and help develop software in-house application on Azure platform
Cộng tác với Product Owner và Scrum Master để chia sẻ phản hồi về quá trình phát triển các sản phẩm nội bộ và giúp phát triển ứng dụng phần mềm nội bộ trên nền tảng Azure
Lead and develop initiatives to drive the adoption of innovative applications with Cloud Services latest technology stack
Dẫn dắt và phát triển các sáng kiến để thúc đẩy việc áp dụng các ứng dụng sáng tạo với nền tản g công nghệ mới nhất của Dịch vụ đám mây
Having applied technical and insurance knowledges:
Understand business users’ expectation in term of insurance application portfolios and business priorities to design solution architectures.
Hiểu mong đợi người dùng về danh mục ứng dụng bảo hiểm và các ưu tiên kinh doanh để thiết kế kiến trúc giải pháp hiệu quả
Have deep practical technical knowledges and insurance business to create platform modernization roadmap to meet business needs, ensuring technical viability and successful deployments.
Có kiến thức kỹ thuật thực tế sâu sắc và kinh doanh bảo hiểm để tạo ra lộ trình hiện đại hóa nền tảng đáp ứng nhu cầu kinh doanh, đảm bảo tính khả thi về kỹ thuật và triển khai thành công
Collaborate with other architecture members in developing complex end-to-end enterprise solutions.
Cộng tác với các thành viên kiến trúc khác trong việc phát triển các giải pháp phức tạp
Ensure all solutions exhibit “well-architected” framework such as high levels of performance, security, scalability, maintainability, reliability and appropriate reuse-ability.
Đảm bảo tất cả các giải pháp thể hiện “được kiến trúc tốt” như mức hiệu suất cao, bảo mật, khả năng mở rộng, khả năng bảo trì, độ tin cậy và khả năng tái sử dụng
Run architectural design sessions to plan implementation solutions and outcomes are consensus on design solutions and next steps toward production
Điều hành các phiên thiết kế kiến trúc để lập kế hoạch cho các giải pháp được thực hiện tốt và kết quả là sự đồng thuận về các giải pháp thiết kế và các bước thực hiện tiếp theo
Share insights and good practices with Engineering teams to remove blockers during the solution delivery phrase.
Chia sẻ thông tin chi tiết và các phương pháp hay với nhóm Kỹ thuật để loại bỏ các cản trở trong giai đoạn triển khai giải pháp
Be together with Engineering team to trouble shot technical issues during the running phrase.
Cùng với nhóm Kỹ thuật để khắc phục sự cố kỹ thuật trong giai đoạn chạy dự án
Be a part of the enterprise architecture hub
Trở thành một phần của trung tâm kiến trúc doanh nghiệp
Leading the communication and well collaborate with business owner and development team:
Must have excellent communication and leadership skills
Phải xuất sắc trong kỹ năng giao tiếp và lãnh đạo
Be the single point of contact for understanding business requirements and expectations from the product
Là đầu mối liên hệ duy nhất để hiểu các yêu cầu kinh doanh và kỳ vọng từ sản phẩm
Interpret well business requirements and be a good bridge between development team and business owners
Giải thích tốt các yêu cầu kinh doanh và là cầu nối tốt giữa nhóm phát triển và các phòng ban trong doanh nghiệp
Job Requirements:
Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology is a distinct advantage.
Bằng cử nhân về Khoa học máy tính, Công nghệ thông tin có một lợi thế đặc biệt
Knowledge and skill
Being held Microsoft Certified Azure Solutions Architect - a plus
Có Chứng nhận Microsoft Certified Azure Solutions Architect là một điểm cộng
Have experience with Azure cloud and hybrid infrastructure, architecture design, cloud migration, and technology management.
Có kinh nghiệm với đám mây Azure và cơ sở hạ tầng kết hợp, thiết kế kiến trúc, di chuyển qua đám mây và quản lý công nghệ
Own experience of scaling applications in enterprise environment using Azure app services, API management, server-less technologies, containers, micro-service frameworks.
Trải nghiệm riêng về mở rộng ứng dụng trong môi trường doanh nghiệp bằng cách sử dụng dịch vụ ứng dụng Azure, quản lý API, server-less technologies, containers, micro-service frameworks.
Have technical experience with cloud native app hosting through software design, development, deployment, and app refactoring/migration.
Có trãi nghiệm với dịch vụ lưu trữ ứng dụng trên đám mây thông qua thiết kế, phát triển, triển khai và tái cấu trúc / di chuyển ứng dụng lên cloud
Have software development practices such as DevOps, CICD tool chains (Jenkins, Azure DevOps)
Có kinh nghiệm thực t ế phát triển phần mềm như DevOps, chuỗi công cụ CICD (Jenkins, Azure DevOps)
Be able to well communicate product roadmap and strategy to business owners and stakeholders
Có thể truyền đạt tốt lộ trình và chiến lược sản phẩm cho các phòng ban doanh nghiệp và các bên liên quan
Show resilient, effective and future-ready workforce
Thể hiện là người lao động kiên cường, hiệu quả và sẵn sàng cho tương lai
Have problem-solving skills with ability to influence key stakeholders, team members and peers.
Có kỹ năng giải quyết vấn đề với khả năng ảnh hưởng đến các bên liên quan, các thành viên trong nhóm và đồng nghiệp

description:

title: Senior Key Account Manager (eCommerce)
description:
About Intrepid
Intrepid Group (www.intrepid.asia), an Ascential company (https://www.ascential.com/), is a leading regional Digital and Ecommerce Services Provider in South East Asia. We offer end-to-end omni-channel ecommerce management, a wide range of Digital Marketing Services and advanced Insights & Analytics, all powered by state of the art inhouse Technology to our client base of leading international brands across >10 marketplaces and multiple social platforms in all 6 SEA countries. Brands love our regional presence, our excellent pro-active ecommerce service which is enabled by our strong team, and our advanced marketing and tech capabilities.

We are part of Ascential (https://www.ascential.com), a global leader in information, analytics and eCommerce optimization. Together with Ascential, Intrepid is growing rapidly, with many exciting opportunities to work with leading brands and ecommerce platforms across multiple categories. By joining us, you’ll get to experience what it takes to drive a successful ecommerce business end to end.

The role:
As a Key Account Manager, you will be responsible for managing and growing the ecommerce business of one or multiple accounts across all ecommerce platforms in Thailand. As the account’s main point of contact and trusted advisor, you create the ecommerce strategy and plans for your brands and take ownership of their stores like it is yours. You negotiate with account and platform stakeholders to maximize the attractiveness of propositions for consumers and exposure for the account, in order to grow the business. You have a firm grasp of ecommerce fundamentals and the growth levers that the different marketplaces offer. You coordinate with our different in-house teams and ensure that collectively you make your accounts successful.
You are responsible for account NMV and revenue growth and work closely with the business development team to explore how your brands can benefit from additional services.

Responsibilities:
Grow account NMV and revenue
Build strong relationships with your brand and platforms
Deliver expert recommendations on the best strategy / promotions / growth levers for brands
Develop annual growth plans and activation calendars and campaign proposals
Check and monitor stock levels
Manage all product content, store, and details on E-Commerce platform such as Lazada, Shopee, JD central etc.
Ensure all brand / store KPIs are met
Support brands to maximize sales and targets
Collaborate with management on NMV goals, planning and forecasting
Work together with Intrepid leadership to ensure account retention and growth

Who we look for – the ideal profile:
University degree in any fields
4 + years experience in Key account management or Store operations in Ecommerce (Lazada / Shopee/ Tiki), with another enabler, or with a brand or distributors
Commercial performance-driven mindset, Flexible & collaborative attitude, looking to make an impact and thriving in a fast-paced start-up environment
Strong interpersonal, relationship and communication, and data analysis

What we offer:
Excellent and competitive compensation package
Professional and open international working environment – culturally integrating the best of all cultures to take the best of each and ensure we build an energetic, commercial, and fun working atmosphere.
You are one of the pioneers of a new and cutting edge Intrepid product underpinned by strong tech. You have a key position in the Intrepid Insights team working on a unique product solving complex data challenges.
Ample opportunity for personal and professional development, both on the job and through regular training (Ecommerce topics, technical skills, soft skills and leadership training) made available on our proprietary learning platform Intrepid University
You will work with many brilliant co-workers who are movers and shakers of the industry, as well as with leading brand and ecosystem partners across all categories to shape their presence across all ecommerce platforms in the years to come, and will have a broad view on the latest developments in the South East Asian e-commerce ecosystem

title: Data Analyst - Fintech
Sales Account Manager - South
description:
At Hitachi Energy our purpose is advancing a sustainable energy future for all. We bring power to our homes, schools, hospitals and factories. Join us and work with fantastic people, while learning and developing yourself on projects that have a real impact to our communities and society. Bring your passion, bring your energy, and be part of a global team that appreciates a simple truth: Diversity + Collaboration = Great Innovation
Cover the Non UT market for Hitachi Energy in Vietnam. Support the sales team in marketing and sales activities and represent the interests for the Hitachi Energy in Vietnam. Develop profitable and sustainable sales for the complete portfolio in Vietnam. Implement the BU strategies in conjunction with Global PGGI, PGGA, PGHV & PGTR Business Unit.
Your responsibilities
Sales and marketing: Leads the implementation of strategies and initiatives at a country level to ensure appropriate sales and marketing efforts within Vietnam. Ensures the Global PGGI , PGTR,PGGA, PGHV Business Unit portfolio is appropriately represented in the local market.
Market coverage: Manages and is responsible for the demand market & demand side budget for Power Grid Division including third party sales, internal sales, and channels. Manages and is responsible for the Power Grids Division demand-side budget of Vietnam. Ensure proper coverage in the market covering Utilities, Industries and Infrastructure & Transport segment. Develop the “Power Generation” market for PGGI in Vietnam.
Planning: Develops business strategies and sales and marketing plans in partnership with local Marketing and Sales teams. Participates in the budgeting process, including preparing the Market Information (Total Market, Available Market, Offered Market, Demand Budget, etc as per HITACHI ENERGY MAP Tools & guidelines), representing the Global PGGI BUs.
Marketing: Coordinate’s lifecycle marketing and ensures effective execution in the local market. Coordinates and supports the factories’/supplying units’ sales and marketing activities.
Market analysis: Oversees the market intelligence process ensuring detailed market analyses of market drivers and trends, key competition, and emerging technologies. Produces monthly and ad-hoc reports to monitor market and progress.
Resources: Ensures local sales teams are provided with necessary training and receive appropriate accreditation. Works together with Global Sales Marketing, Hub Sales & Marketing and Marketing Communication (Global, Hub & Local) for planning and implementation of marketing activities.
Customer relations: In line with the sales team strategy manages and develops appropriate relationships with customers and key accounts. Serves as escalation point for questions and issues and collects customer feedback and input.
Bid and proposal: Ensures proposals are developed and approved to enable negotiations. Oversees quotations to promote optimal outcome. Ensures all status updates and documentation are accurately tracked in appropriate systems. Takes local responsibility for the Business Units mix and maintains the accuracy of data for project pipeline and orders received forecast and competitive feedback.
After-sales: Organizes and promotes after sales service activities. Ensures appropriate order handling of products/systems/services. Ensures contracts are appropriately managed with adherence to payment terms.
People leadership and development: Ensures (with HR Manager support) that the area of responsibility is properly organized, staffed, skilled and directed. Coaches, motivates and develops direct and indirect subordinates within HR policies. Drives and ensures know-how sharing and cross-collaboration
Safety: Lead, drive and hold itself accountable for the highest standards of health, safety and environment to ensure Zero Harm is achieved. Responsible for compliance with relevant HSE policy and procedures, ensuring proactive risk assessments take place and corrective actions monitored/followed up. Build an injury, incident, near miss and hazard reporting culture within your team, guaranteeing reported incidents will be investigated and action taken. Create a workplace where everyone views health, safety and environment as the most important non-negotiable value of your business.
Your background
Knowledge –Degree in Electrical/Electronics/Mechanical Engineering. MBA in Sales & Marketing will be added advantage. Exposure and detailed knowledge of substation & automation and practices of PLN for substations will be highly useful.
Skills – Proficient with MS Word, Excel, power points and presentation. Demonstrated Negotiation skills
Experience – 2 to 8 years of relevant experience in Utility/Power business with exposure to either turnkey substations or high voltage products or system integration for substations (EPCs / Service Providers). The person should be self-starter, outgoing with ability to engage, build relationships and gain trust.
Deliver Results - Prioritize, Act, Achieve.
Results orientation - drive to exceed goals & improve business.
Strategic orientation - define own plan within larger strategy & contribute to strategy beyond own area.
Collaborate - Listen, Value, Engage.
Teamwork & collaboration – push for teamwork & facilitate collaboration.
People development - give behavioral feedback & develop talent systematically.
Innovate - Challenge, Create, Change.
Change leadership - define a case for change & mobilize individuals to change.
Intercultural sensitivity and effectiveness - function well across cultures, act as facilitator between cultures, develop ownership & accountability locally.
Focus Externally - Customers, Partners, Markets.
Customer & market orientation - anticipate and addresses evolving customers and market needs & build close and sustainable customers relationships.
Act Responsibly - Integrity, Transparency, Safety.
Personal leadership - engage team commitment & empower teams to perform.
More about us
Hitachi Energy is a global technology leader that is advancing a sustainable energy future for all. We serve customers in the utility, industry and infrastructure sectors with innovative solutions and services across the value chain. Together with customers and partners, we pioneer technologies and enable the digital transformation required to accelerate the energy transition towards a carbon-neutral future. We are advancing the world’s energy system to become more sustainable, flexible and secure whilst balancing social, environmental and economic value. Hitachi Energy has a proven track record and unparalleled installed base in more than 140 countries. Headquartered in Switzerland, we employ around 38,000 people in 90 countries and generate business volumes of approximately $10 billion USD. www.hitachienergy.com #LI-SEA1

2022-12-28

VN53544285_E6

title: macOS Engineer (Objective-C/Swift)
description:
About Naver and Naver Vietnam:
NAVER Co., Ltd. is South Korea's largest web search engine, as well as a global ICT brand that provides services including LINE messenger, currently with over 200 million users from around the world, the SNOW video app, the digital comics platform NAVER WEBTOON, a B2B communication platform headed towards the global market WORKS MOBILE, a leading market music app TUNE, a social platform BBOOM, NAVER SHOPPING provides the latest on trends, products and retail ... In 2018, NAVER was ranked as the 9th most innovative company in the world by Forbes and top 6th Future 50 company by Fortune magazine.
In 2021, NAVER VIETNAM expands its operations in the Information Technology market in two (2) largest cities of Vietnam, expanding the Global R&D Belt with HUST and PTIT in Ha Noi, establishing Naver Vietnam Development Center (NVDC) in Ho Chi Minh city and on process to set up another NVDC in Ha Noi with the goal of becoming one of the strongest development centers in Asia with 3 core values of: " Autonomy - Challenge - Teamwork".
In 2022, NAVER VIETNAM continues to enhance sponsorship for UIT students to learn high-quality programming courses. This year, we also open a new center named GWE Webtoon Operation Center to provide our comics lovers around the world with the best experiences.
We are looking for Senior macOS Engineer.
Your daily tasks:
Participate in the development of the company service project
Collaborate in a team environment to design, develop, and deliver reliable software solutions for customers
Design, develop, document, analyze, test, integrate, debug, research, and integrate new architectural features into existing infrastructure.
Verify that developed product features are thoroughly implemented, meeting all specified requirements
Continue to learn new technologies, introduce existing products, improve the product experience and create more value.
Your background:
At least 3 years of software development experience on macOS/iOS using Objective-C/Swift
Familiar with Objective-C, Swift, and also familiar with common data structure and algorithm.
Strong experience with AppKit, Foundation, Core Graphics, Core Animation and other relevant frameworks
Have certain Experience with multi-threaded, network sockets, high-performance code.
In-depth understanding of object-oriented programming ideas and design patterns, excellent coding habits.
Familiar with common network communication protocols and proficient in using common encrypting algorithms.
Minimum three (3) years in developing complex software, ensuring a collaborative environment, and configuration management.
Experience implementing software life cycle management (requirements, design, develop, test, validate, deploy).

Plus :
Good at communication and problem solving.
Have the experience of macOS App development will be an advantage.
From solid welfare programs to autonomy over working time and place, we create the culture in which we work. By joining NAVER VIETNAM, you will be involved in:
A work-life balance: A-class brand new offices located in the city center with flexible working option; Annual leave 14 days, add 1 day to every year.
Competitive income package: Performance appraisal every year, incentive bonus...
Learning and development opportunities: We provide annual budget for employee to learn anything related to languages and technologies & monthly budget for buying any books you want to read.
Protecting and enhancing healthcare plan for you and your family: We provide premium health insurance for employee and 2 family members, health-check every year and premium gym membership.
Employee 's engagement activities: You will be involved in a fun and respectful working environment, we support monthly budget for team engagement.
Other benefits: One-off allowance for setting up working from home corner, work dedication bonus.

title: Senior Strategic Planner
description:
Position: Senior Strategic Planner
Team: Client Solutions
Reporting Line: Client Solutions, Senior Manager

CREATORY is not a traditional agency. We are always on the next wave of the digital age. From the root of successful influencer marketing, we expand our capacity to provide total solutions for brands including IP management & development, content solution, community building, brand social channel, IMC plan, virtual production. Especially with technology based and pivoting to the future, we navigate to web3 by providing total solutions which promote blockchain-based brands/products or services. We cherish our entrepreneurial spirit and embrace the opportunity to rethink media & content to get out of agency definition.

We are working for several local and international clients incl. LG, CJ, Orion, Mirae, NH Securities, Likelion,... Not just work as a service provider, we play as strategic partners to brands. We are growing fast and we know that our success is a direct result of our talents.

We would like to find someone who can embrace this chance as a part of our established strategy team - A team working together to deliver both exceptional brand strategy and future-defining community strategy - truly realising the potential of community/communication marketing. Through the diversification of services, you will have opportunities to work on strategic plans stretched from web2 traditional brands to web3 brands (p2e, NFT, …)

B, MAIN RESPONSIBILITIES
For client:
Get and clarify the brief from client and understand it deeply
Examine clients’ businesses to get to know their brands and understand their marketing objectives
conduct research (including both primary and secondary research) to gather data to understand the market trends, competitors, consumer insights
Set up and build up strategic approach/rationale and communication direction for planning team to develop marketing proposals that meet client’s requirements and budget
Maximise the use of Creatory’s available resources (such as: KOLs, virtual KOLs, virtual production, metaverse, etc.) to leverage communication strategy for clients
Leverage and strategically use digital platforms such as Tiktok, Youtube, Facebook, Instagram, Telegram, Discord,etc… to convey brand message
Work with creatives and accounts to deploy the detailed execution plan
Join pitching with persuasive storytelling
Modify plan based on client's feedback and request
Follow up execution phase to make sure the plan is carried out smoothly and adjust execution plan to adapt the market trends or reality if necessary
Coordinate and quality check the proposals from freelance planner if any
For internal:
Guide and conduct internal training in mine data, research, industry knowledge, critical & strategic thinking
Research and produce/collect reports of market trends, consumer behaviour, industry knowledge to develop strategy team or for internal use
Research and give strategic direction to consult other teams for internal projects such as: roadmap and awareness campaign of exclusive KOLs, sales campaign for exclusive KOL's merchandise, etc.
Perform other tasks as requested by Line Manager

C, YOUR PROFILE
At least 3-4 years of experience in a similar role in an advertising environment.
Experience mining for and examining research data from multiple sources including primary and secondary research (data monitors, reports, etc.) and crafting thoughtful research reviews to be used for planning to develop insights, strategies and ideas.
Proven track record in developing strategic digital marketing plans .
A channel leader who deeply understands today’s media ecosystem and makes clear recommendations on how to get the best out of each.
Demonstrated track record of bringing insight, strategy and ideas generation to new business pitches
Ability to look at both the big picture and details
Strong communication and interpersonal skills to communicate effectively with internal and external people
Be practical and down-to-earth to offer feasible solutions for both clients and internal teams.
Willing to go further to gain a high proposal winning rate
Excellent written and verbal communication skills in English and Vietnamese.

D, OFFER
Full time job within a growing and trendsetting advertising agency in a metaverse workplace.
Work with the A-team and new types of global clients and projects: Virtual, Communities, and blockchain-based products/services,...
An attractive package such as: annual leave day, annual health check, social insurance, health insurance, unemployment insurance
Join company event, company trip
13-monthly salary
Continuous trainings do level up both hard skills and soft skills
Strong flexibility business plan
Rotation opportunities for new business models if you wish
Career conversation and growing opportunities with the promotion program
Diverse and inclusive work culture
Dynamic, young, and passionate team

E, ADDITIONAL INFORMATION
Recruitment Process

1/ 10 - Minute Phone Screening: (Only qualified candidates will be contacted by HR team. Thanks for understanding)
2/ 1st Interview (Onsite) with Client Solution Manager - Line Manager
3/ 2nd Interview (Onsite) with COO

SF Support / Aircall / Q&A Community.

Important notice (Post
Tip / Trick (Post)

Become familiar with and understand deeply Onix products.
Together with the product team, educate Onix customers about our product features and their benefits.
You are the frontline hero in supporting our customers when they have struggles in using Onix products.
Create product content (both copywriting and content writing) such as knowledge bases, user guide and manual, release notes, important notices, tips and tricks in using Onix products.
These product content can be in many formats: articles, posts, videos, websites, pictures, and emails.
Explore new ways to monitor, grow, and engage customers to our community by providing them with regular, helpful content that's aligned with their needs and interests.
Build and manage the company's social media profiles and presence, including websites, Onix Community, YouTube, Facebook, and LinkedIn.
Manage various product marketing and email campaigns, including the template designs, calls-to-action, and content used in our email sends. Track their success and insights to deliver suitable strategies.
Track, measure, and analyze all initiatives to report on social media ROI.
Manage and improve organic search engine performance and goal-setting based on clickthrough rates, traffic, and conversions.

Your Skills and Experience
A POTENTIAL CANDIDATE WILL HAVE
Prior experience in copywriting with exceptional English writing skills, as well as the ability to adopt the style, tone, and voice of our business' various types of content.
Outstanding verbal English communication to meet and support customers.
A passion and understanding of the software development industry.
Proficiency in content management systems (HubSpot). You will be expected to build community pages, emails, content, and optimize them to engage customers.
Knowledge of analytical software and digital marketing software to track and monitor insights of Onix social channels.
Has an eye of art, able to deliver graphic designs for the content.
Experience and skills in Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator).
Basic experience in video editing skill.
CHARACTERISTIC
We need an extraordinary perceptive mind to understand Onix products in depth.
A positive thinking to create a joyful atmosphere. We want to see you happy every day you go to work.
Proactiveness is needed to always take initiative.
As we mentioned, we always try to renew ourselves, so adaptiveness is a must-have.
Self-manage, you will be the one who's in charge of your own work.

Why You'll Love Working Here

title: Application Consulting Intern
description:
Position overview
Are you looking to pursue a career in consulting or technology implementing? Gain practical experience by working alongside SunSystems professionals that will provide you with actual insights into the field of consulting, project management, and technology implementation.
Infor SunSystems is a modern, comprehensive financial accounting management solution designed to help international enterprises and fast-growing companies handle complex financial activities.
As a SunSystems Consulting Intern, you will be learning about all facets of successful software implementation and how the right IT solution can enable clients to improve their key business processes and enhance productivity.
You can expect your internship at TRG will be packed full of hands-on training, networking activities plus the opportunity to work from practically anywhere.
Please note: This is an unpaid internship.
What does a successful Application Consulting Intern look like?
Software implementation
You act as the pillar of support for our senior consultants during the implementation of the software and ensure the project gets rolled out according to plan.
System installation and configuration
Data migration
User acceptance testing
Solution production run
Functional specification documentation
Post-implementation support
Support our senior consultants in troubleshooting issues post-implementation, thus, maintaining a healthy relationship with customers.
Diagnose, research, analyse issues related to platform, software functionality, configuration, and data
Prepare system and project documentation
What’s in it for you?
Independently Work From Anywhere (WFA) you want: our offices, your home, PJ’s Coffee, coffee shop, beach, it's up to you
Modern, green, and open office space with lounge areas, spacious lunchroom, free covered / secure motorbike parking unlimited free PJ’s Coffee from our own coffee shop downstairs
Working with our Diverse and Inclusive TRG community with colleagues WFA from across the globe
Strong culture to support your learning and development and growth
Multiple (12+) networking / collaboration / learning / training events each month
Training and certification support
Free access to our library (1000+ books), multiple online training portals/ universities/ academies
What you need
An infinitely curious and open mind
A passion to learn and grow
Excellent problem-solving, time management, and interpersonal skills
A genuine passion for delighting customers
A risk-taker who can work independently and can tolerate stressful workloads
Solid knowledge in Accounting, Information Technology or related disciplines
Fluent in English and Vietnamese
Recruitment process
Apply via our Career page: https://careers.trginternational.com/ -> Pre-hire assessments (received via email right after your application submission, please complete them within 3 days) -> HR round -> Final round
