title: Emerging Countries Account Manager
description:
What a Emerging Countries Account Manager does at HP:
Serves as the expert to the partner for complex information regarding product, services, and software transitions, promotions, and configurations.
Educates and updates partners on new HP technologies or solutions. May be brought in by partners to sell HP brand to end customers.
Establishes and maintains account plans to promote sales growth.
Achieves assigned quota for HP products, services, and software.
Transactional and relationship selling working within a team of selling professionals.
Creates, fills-in and manages HP funnel for deals with partners and transforms potential leads into joint sales activities.
Establishes relationship with partner at all organization levels including senior executives.
Ensures partners are compliant with legal and SBC practices.
May drive SOW growth with distributors who are managing small partners on behalf of HP.
May recruit and develop business relationship with new partners.
Individuals who do well in this role at HP, usually possess:
University or Bachelor's degree preferred.
Typically 5-8 years of selling experience at end-user account or partner level.
Solid experience in selling to partners in a complex environment.
Solid understanding of the IT industry, competing vendors, and the channel. Dimensions include competitive positioning.
Solid understanding of HP's organization & operations, including key business rules, and alignment with HP GBU go-to-market strategies, partner segmentation, key programs & initiatives, structure.
Solid understanding of many of HP's products, software, and services. Able to communicate the strengths of HP's offerings, and overcome objections.
Effectively sells HP offerings by building strategic relationships with partner decision makers; and promoting HP programs and offerings.
Develops account plans with partner to grow HP's share of the business.
Partners effectively with others in the account to ensure coordinated efficient account management.
Ability to motivate partner's sales force.
Solid understanding of pipeline management discipline and ability to explain benefits to partners.
Sustainable impact is HP’s commitment to create positive, lasting change for the planet, its people, and our communities. This serves as a guiding principle for delivering on our corporate vision – to create technology that makes life better for everyone, everywhere.
#Li-Post

About HP

You’re out to reimagine and reinvent what’s possible—in your career as well as the world around you.
So are we. We love taking on tough challenges, disrupting the status quo, and creating what’s next. We’re in search of talented people who are inspired by big challenges, driven to learn and grow, and dedicated to making a meaningful difference.

HP is a technology company that operates in more than 170 countries around the world united in creating technology that makes life better for everyone, everywhere.

Our history: HP’s commitment to diversity, equity and inclusion – it's just who we are.
From the boardroom to factory floor, we create a culture where everyone is respected and where people can be themselves, while being a part of something bigger than themselves. We celebrate the notion that you can belong at HP and bring your authentic self to work each and every day. When you do that, you’re more innovative and that helps grow our bottom line. Come to HP and thrive!

title: Senior Japanese - English Translator
description:
Mô tả công việc:
(Mức lương: 11 - 34 triệu VNĐ)
会社概要
The Bosch Group is a leading global supplier of technology and services. It employs roughly 394,500 associates worldwide (as of December 31, 2020). According to preliminary figures, the company generated sales of 71.6 billion euros in 2020. Its operations are divided into four business sectors: Mobility Solutions, Industrial Technology, Consumer Goods, and Energy and Building Technology.
The Bosch Group comprises Robert Bosch GmbH and its roughly 440 subsidiaries and regional companies in some 60 countries. If its sales and service partners are included, then Bosch is represented in roughly 126 locations. This worldwide development, manufacturing, and sales network is the foundation for further growth.
BGSV – Bosch Global Software Technologies Company Limited (Previous name: RBVH - Robert Bosch Engineering and Business Solutions Vietnam Company Limited) is 100% owned subsidiary of Robert Bosch GmbH.
BGSV has started its operations from 19th October, 2010 at E-Town2 in HCMC. This engineering development center will be engaged in developing embedded systems and software, mechanical design and simulation, and will provide IT (SAP Consulting, JAVA Development….) and Business Services (Finance and accounting, Economics, Purchasing, Logistics, Translations Japanese-English-Japanese, Information Security ) solutions to the Bosch group of companies globally.
求人内容
Our Translation service provider team is looking for a Japanese Translator to work out of our office in Hochiminh City, Vietnam. You will bear final responsibility for the quality of translations of Engineering, Technical and Infrastructure, Automotive Manufacturer safety regulations, etc. contents from English into Japanese and vice versa. We are looking for talented individuals to fill a variety of roles within our IT enabled service team to support our internal and global Clients.
Your focus:
+ Receive documents and make quotation of translation.
+ Perform translation for documentations (e-mails, technical specifications, minutes of meeting etc.) from Japanese language to English and vice versa.
+ Work in liaison with professional translation agency in managing translation tasks assigned and ensure the quality of output from vendors meet the customer requirement.
+ Build and manage terminology resources such as glossaries, style guides, and translation memory files.
+ Well engaged with customer to ask feedback of translation quality.
+ Participates in meetings in Japanese, takes notes, prepares documents of understanding and interpret, explains engineers about the topic in English. (potential role in future)
Chức vụ: Nhân Viên/Chuyên Viên
Hình thức làm việc: Toàn thời gian
Quyền lợi được hưởng:
13th-month bonus + yearly performance bonus + annual salary appraisal
Premium health insurance for employee + 2 family members
16++ days of paid leave per year
Yêu cầu bằng cấp (tối thiểu): Trung cấp - Nghề
Yêu cầu công việc:
資格
+ At least 2 - 5 years of translation and interpreter experiences from Japanese to English & vice versa.
+ Proficient in English in both speaking and writing skills.
+ Japanese JLPT N2 or above with good speaking and writing skills.
+ Having Chinese (HSK5) is preferable .
+ Well versed in using office applications (Excel, word, PowerPoint).
+ High team work spirit.
Yêu cầu giới tính: Nam/Nữ

title: Project Manager
description:
About Anchanto:
Anchanto helps all businesses to exploit the full potential of e-commerce. Our suite of SaaS Products enables companies globally to springboard omnichannel sales, scale fulfilment operations, and use intelligent data to grow their e-commerce, logistics & warehousing activities. Leading, brands, distributors, retailers, and logistic enterprises such as L'Oréal, Decathlon, or DHL Supply Chain rely on our technology to scale their local and global e-commerce operations.
Headquartered in Singapore and with more than 10 local offices across Asia-Pacific, the Middle East and Europe, we are growing rapidly and looking for ambitious people to join our teams to build the future successes of Anchanto.
The Role: Project Manager - Vietnam
Managing Project and Product deliveries as per the PMO processes. Managing the projects from kick-off to Go-live. Weekly reporting of project status to internal and external stakeholders. Single point of contact for customers.
Responsibilities:
Lead enterprise level projects that involve customized solutions, integrations, coordination with multiple teams at the customer side and internally.
Responsible for all the activities with taking over the lead from the Sales team on the project until successful Go-live.
Map the customer requirements and solution provided by the Solution Architect in order to ensure the requirements and expectations are matching
Manage the complete project from initiation to successful delivery
Responsible for the daily management through the life cycle of the program and close coordination with the customer
Follow the Project Management Office processes for initiation, planning, execution, monitoring and control and reporting.
Works as a bridge between multiple internal teams and Customer side stakeholders from different functions/ teams/ departments
Clear, Timely and Crisp communication with customer
Plan the overall project and monitor progress to make sure that milestones are being met across various small and big activities
Manage the risks and issues that might and do arise over the course of the project life cycle, as well as take measures to correct them when they occur.
Make sure the deliverables are aligned across the teams internally and with customer side
Not involved in the software development responsibility, but works closely with the Director of Software Development, Solution Architects, Implementation Teams and Sales team member responsible for the account sale
Responsible for the Successful Go-Live of the Project and handover to Support Team
Required Skills:
Excellent written and verbal communication
Proficient with English and Vietnamese languages
Understand customer lifecycle and behavior
Ability to work with teams in different geographies
Experience in Supply Chain is a must
Experience in eCommerce and Logistics domain is desired
Ability to clearly communicate internally and externally
Analytical and problem-solving skills
Experience Required:
10 yrs experience in Information Technology
3 years' experience in Supply Chain
Benefits:
A chance to build career with a fast-growing global SaaS tech company
An opportunity to collaborate with global teams on interesting projects
Competitive salary package
Amazing work-life balance

Mô Tả Công Việc
We are seeking a Lead Software Engineer who is part of the team to develop a scalable SaaS-based platform that operates on AWS Cloud.
You will be a part of a cross-functional Agile team that continuously delivers product with satisfaction and confidence.Your solutions will make recognized contributions to end-users in 175+ countries. Your responsibilities will be as follows:
Collaborate and propose solutions to abstract existing services for reusability or to improve performance
Work closely with Solution Architects on the high level design and do tech spikes to ensure delivery feasibility
Work closely with CloudOps team to define & build CI/CD process for release services which meet compliance and quality requirements
Proactively identify and provide suggestions for better dev experience to increase dev speed / productivity
Contribute to Katalon SaaS Platform to optimize the operation and maximize business value
Collaborate with Product team and take initiative to propose ideas and solutions that solve business problems
Collaborate with the architecture team to create and maintain the solution document;
Collaborate with team leaders to catch up and standardizing the development process
Take leadership and work with team to archive the quarter and yearly goals
Be a leader to set goals, training and coaching to team members
Take part in the engineering working group to refine best practices and standards to apply throughout the development process
Assist customer support to troubleshooting, analyze issues and provide turnaround actions timely per agreed SLA
Define the engineering process to increase productivity and propose any improvements
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
Must-have
Solid experience in Cloud native platform development
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science/ Software Engineering or equivalent, especially with Data Structures & Algorithm
Solid Java experience and knowledge of threading, concurrency, web services (RESTful)
Experience with front-end technologies such as React, Vue JS or Angular
Experience with automation frameworks such as Selenium/Cypress/Playwright
Experience with cloud infrastructures like AWS, Kubernetes
Experience with event driven, message queues frameworks like RabbitMQ, Kafka
Good English communication skills (both verbal & written)
Good understanding of Scrum and Agile
Demonstrated organizational, analytical, and problem-solving skills
Able to work with "Can-Do" spirit
Nice-to-have
Knowledge of serverless architecture;
Experience with microservices architecture;
Experience with Reactive programming;
Experience with SaaS business model.
Tại Sao Bạn Sẽ Yêu Thích Làm Việc Tại Đây
At Katalon, we bring together self-starting, open-minded, and talented people while actively promoting a transparent and growth-enabling working environment. But don’t just take our word for it. Take a better look below!
Attractive compensation package including achievable Quarterly Performance Bonus (modeled at 120% gross monthly salary) and 13th-Month Bonus
19 Annual leave days and other supportive allowances
Flexible working time and place together with high-end working equipment at the high-class new office at Viettel Building (Dist. 10, HCMC)
Diverse & International Working Environment with Agile culture
Premium healthcare package for you and your loved ones
A company trip every summer, an annual year-end party, team-building activities, and so much more fun are waiting for you!
Katalon is proud to be an equal-opportunity employer. We care about our people and celebrate our differences. We want to work with talented, collaborative, and innovative people. We do not discriminate in hiring or any employment decision based on race, color, religion, national origin, age, sex (including pregnancy, childbirth, or related medical conditions), marital status, ancestry, physical or mental disability, genetic information, veteran status, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, or other characteristics protected by law.

title: Senior Tax Manager
description:
Introduction
Concung is the biggest omni-channel company for mom & baby with 600 retail stores in Vietnam in 2021 and plan to have 1,000 stores by 2023 with 1 billion USD revenue. Concung's annual growth rate is more than 70%. With the vision of providing good quality products for children, Concung is strongly investing into Product Research and Development in order to manufacture and provide products that are suitable to the local market in terms of pricing and quality. We also invest into technology in order to manage the network and online channel efficiently.
Concung Corporation also develops in-house cutting-edge automation and intelligence technologies. We are seeking for young, smart & dynamic talents to grow your career together with us.

Job Description
Reporting Line: To CFO
1. Tax related matters
Overall responsible for all tax regulations and matters which are applicable to the company, including but not limited to CIT, VAT, WHT, Transfer price related matters, and PIT
Ensure all new tax regulations and updates are well informed to the management and applied accordingly (if applicable)
Submit all tax related periodicad-hoc to related government agencies
Be the main coordinator to work with government auditors on tax audits
Work closely with Finance, Accounting and HR to ensure all financial/ HR records are recorded and reported in a structured & transparent manner.
2. Tax compliance practice
Ensure all new tax regulations and updates are well informed to the management and applied accordingly (if applicable)
Ensure good practices & controls are recommended and implemented to minimize tax risk exposures for the company
Act as In-house expertise (or work with 3rd party if necessary) to give advice to related (business) functions to ensure company’s business practices stay compliant with local applicable regulatory requirements
Periodically carry out tax compliance assessments, timely raise tax risk exposure to the management team and recommend mitigating actions
3. Business improvement & control practice
Actively participate in (major) business processes, suggest improvements for better efficiency and controls for company (and to minimize tax risk exposures). Areas of involvement will be (but not limited to): sales to collection, purchase to pay, promotion execution, treasury
Joinlead change initiatives to automate and/improve company/ Finance process efficiency
4. Any other ad hoc assignmentstasks given by CFO


Requirement
1. Competencies
Understand very well Vietnam tax regulations
Good people leadership
English proficiency in both writing and speaking
Ability to effectively make decisions with limited time and information
Achieve results through influence, persuasion, collaboration and relationship building
2. Experience & other requirements
Degree qualified in Finance and Accounting area
Strong experience in Tax area
Big 4 audit background preferable
Working experience in Retail is preferable
Member of a professional body (e.g. ACCA, CPA) is preferable

Benefit
- Annual bonus: 2 - 3 months under minimum KPI requirement
Participate in the Employee Stock Option Program
Work in a dynamic, open, creative environment
Regular training, company team building, birthday bonus

About Concung
- Working time: 8:30 - 17:30 Monday - Friday
Working place: 14th Floor, Phu My Hung Tower, Tan Phu Ward, Dist. 7, HCMC

Hạn nộp: 03/02/2023

title: Database Engineer
description:
Essential Job Duties and Responsibilities
The database engineer must be able to manage any situation in his field of expertise and contribute to the health of the entire client database environment. He/she must be able to provision instances in complex and sensitive architectures.
He/she will be the main point of escalation for the technical and client teams and must be able to propose new technologies.
He/she must be able to work on any type of on-premise or cloud environment and must be able to learn and adapt continuously.
Your tasks:
Proven working experience as a Database Production Engineer.
Design and implement database architecture in accordance to end user information, needs and views, build high availability database systems
Define users and enable data distribution to the right user, in appropriate format and timely manner
Perform database auditing, optimizing performance of Database systems.
Perform operational DBA duties in a complex environment (patching, environments cloning, database cloning, database upgrades, application upgrades, implementing backup and monitoring procedures).
Minimize database downtime and manage parameters to provide fast query responses
Determine, enforce and document database policies, procedures and standards
Perform regular tests and evaluations to ensure data security, privacy and integrity.
Support project and pre-sales teams in client builds.
To be a force of proposal on the management of the security and confidentiality of the client data.
Propose innovative solutions and architectures to clients. Be a force for new technical proposals.
Have a strong knowledge in operating systems related to databases, know how to manage high availability on OS part.
Knowledge, Skills and Abilities Required
Your tasks:
Proven working experience as a Database Production Engineer.

title: Marketing - Digital Marketing, Senior Associate
Software Tester
description:
CyStack's solutions focus on data protection, cyber attack prevention, and security risk management in the enterprise which won prestigious awards in the cybersecurity industry. Our researchers are regular speakers at world-known cyber security conferences and also talented bug hunters who discovered many critical vulnerabilities in the products and are acknowledged in the Hall of Fame of global tech giants
About the team and role
We are looking for a software tester to join a new project about end-to-end messaging application using blockchain technology called Ready. Ready is a secure and efficient messaging application with crypto wallets integrated. All built with leading-edge technology.
As a member of the testing team, you will be directly involved in the quality assurance of the product
You will
Analyze user stories, use cases, and requirements for validity and feasibility
Prepare and execute manual test activities for mobile, desktop, and web applications
Execute all levels of testing (System, Integration, and Regression)
Design and develop automation scripts when needed
Detect and track software defects and inconsistencies
Apply quality engineering principles throughout the Agile product lifecycle
Provide support and documentation
You may be fit for this role if you
Have a careful, meticulous working style and follow the process.
Have effective communication skills and be energetic and enthusiastic at work.
Have knowledge of testing and software development processes.
Be able to diagnose problems.
Be able to document the testing process.
Be able to manage work with project timelines in a fast-paced environment.
Have experience in software programming/developing is a plus
Benefits
Competitive Salary with Social Insurance and 13th-month salary
Great career development opportunities in a growing company
Inspiring and supportive work environment, good connection with other technology companies
Working on a project that has a big impact and makes you proud
How to apply

Name
Education and work experience
Achievements, awards, certificates
A link to your LinkedIn profile
A brief introduction about yourself (career aspirations, strengths, weaknesses,…)
Please send your CV/Resume to hr@cystack.net with the title [Job application] Software Tester - Your full name

title: Customer Service Representative - (French)
description:
Company Description

Jobs for Humanity is dedicated to building an inclusive and just employment ecosystem. Therefore, we have dedicated this job posting to individuals coming from the following communities: Refugee, Neurodivergent, Single Parent, Blind or Low Vision, Ethnic Minority, and the Previously Incarcerated. If you identify with any of the following communities do not hesitate to register, even if you feel that this particular opportunity is not the right fit for you.

Company Name: Binance

Job Description
Binance is the global blockchain company behind the world’s largest digital asset exchange by trading volume and users, serving a greater mission to accelerate cryptocurrency adoption and increase the freedom of money.

Are you looking to be a part of the most influential company in the blockchain industry and contribute to the crypto-currency revolution that is changing the world?

Binance is looking for an experienced Customer Support representatives to set up and expand our customer support operations.

Customer Support is extremely important for us and we hope to create a platform where our users are well supported with excellent quality, fast response time and accurate information.
Support is via a live chat and phone, and will include but not limited to customer queries, complaints, and identification approval process for our world-class cryptocurrency exchange platform.

The best Customer Service Representatives are genuinely delighted to help customers. They’re tolerant, empathetic, and intensely communicative. Customer Support representatives can put themselves in their clients’ shoes and advocate for them when necessary. Customer feedback is priceless, and our Customer Service Representatives can gather it for us. Problem-solving also comes naturally to customer care specialists. They're confident at troubleshooting and investigate if they don’t have enough knowledge to fix the problem.

Your goal will be to ensure exceptional service standards and sustain high customer satisfaction.

Responsibilities
Handle high amounts of live chat and phone calls
Identify and evaluate customers’ needs to deliver satisfaction
Provide accurate, valid and comprehensive information
Manage complaints, provide proper solutions and options within the time limits; follow up to secure resolution
Follow communication procedures, guidelines, and policies
Go the extra mile to engage customers
Requirements
1+ years experience of proven customer facing experience or experience as a customer service representative
Strong ability in using IT for professional use and can handle somewhat technical queries from customers
Exceptional written communication skill and a good listener
Ability to multi-task, prioritize, and control time effectively
Knowledge of the cryptocurrency/blockchain field is a big plus
Multi-lingual capability is a big plus
French native and fluent in English
Willing to work weekends and irregular hours which will include night shifts

Working at Binance
Do something meaningful; Be a part of the future of finance technology and the no.1 company in the industry
Fast moving, challenging and unique business problems
International work environment and flat organisation
Great career development opportunities in a growing company
Possibility for relocation and international transfers mid-career
Competitive salary
Flexible working hours, Casual work attire

By submitting a job application, you confirm that you have read and agree to our Candidate Privacy Notice.
Apply for this job

title: [EBS3] C/C++ Embedded Software Tester (MiL Testing)
description:
Company Description

The Bosch Group is a leading global supplier of technology and services. It employs roughly 394,500 associates worldwide (as of December 31, 2020). According to preliminary figures, the company generated sales of 71.6 billion euros in 2020. Its operations are divided into four business sectors: Mobility Solutions, Industrial Technology, Consumer Goods, and Energy and Building Technology.
The Bosch Group comprises Robert Bosch GmbH and its roughly 440 subsidiaries and regional companies in some 60 countries. If its sales and service partners are included, then Bosch is represented in roughly 126 locations. This worldwide development, manufacturing, and sales network is the foundation for further growth.
BGSV – Bosch Global Software Technologies Company Limited (Previous name: RBVH - Robert Bosch Engineering and Business Solutions Vietnam Company Limited) is 100% owned subsidiary of Robert Bosch GmbH.

BGSV has started its operations from 19th October, 2010 at E-Town2 in HCMC. This engineering development center will be engaged in developing embedded systems and software, mechanical design and simulation, and will provide IT (SAP Consulting, JAVA Development….) and Business Services (Finance and accounting, Economics, Purchasing, Logistics, Translations Japanese-English-Japanese, Information Security ) solutions to the Bosch group of companies globally.

Job Description

Our vision is to be the software engineering partner for brake system in ASEAN.
We deliver complete software projects (CSPs) to our Bosch counterparts of CC, BEG and 2WP divisions for the OEMs in nearshore regions Japan, China, ASEAN. We perform the end-to-end software development activities including all the roles like developers, testers, integrators, project managers and other special functions like functional safety and cyber security for our projects. We also work on the advanced engineering topics like software engineering for E&E architecture.
Join us in this noble cause of saving lives and develop your career towards these futuristic technologies.
As an Embedded Software Tester (Senior & Junior levels) for EBS3, you will be doing MiL Testing (Model-in-the-Loop) for software components in Automotive domain. Your main responsibilities include:
Perform Unit test (White-Box-Test), Component test (Black-Box-Test)
Creation of stimuli model to obtain predefined requirements of Requirement coverage; Equivalence class coverage; Boundary value coverage; Code coverage (DC, MC/DC)
Test execution and test results analysis
Test report
Participation in the design, testing and optimization of the development and validation processes (regular technical meetings with test management and fellow test colleagues)
Requirements analysis and review
Derivation of test-specs from approved requirements
Support development of test process, methodology and tools
Develop test automation
Solve technical problems/queries
Communicate findings to colleagues in order to prevent technical problems/queries
Mentor junior members (for Senior level)

Qualifications
Major in Computer Engineering/ Electrical-Electronics/ Electronics-Telecommunication/ Mechatronics Engineering/ Physical Engineering or related fields
0-5 years of experience in Embedded Testing/ Software Testing
Mandatory requirement
Good C/C++ programming
Good knowledge of micro-controller and embedded system
Experience in Software Development Lifecycle
Experience in emulators, simulators, debugging and test equipment
Automotive domain knowledge
Good analytical and debugging skills
Good English communication skills
It would be big advantage if you have:
Have knowledge in Matlab or related Simulink language
ISTQB certificate (Foundation level)
Python/VBA scripting language, API programming
Autosar Software Architecture

Additional Information

WHY BOSCH?
Because we don't just follow trends, we create them.
Because together we turn ideas into reality, working every day to make the world of tomorrow a better place. Do you have high standards when it comes to your job? So do we. At Bosch, you will discover more than just work.
Working in one of the Best Places to Work in Vietnam and Top 30 of the Most Innovative Companies all over the world
Join a dynamic and fast growing global company (English-speaking environment)
13th-month salary bonus + attractive performance bonus (you'll love it!) + annual performance appraisal
100% monthly salary and mandatory social insurances in 2-month probation
Onsite opportunities: short-term and long-term assignments
15++ days of annual leave + 1 day of birthday leave
Premium health insurance for employee and 02 family members
Flexible working time
Lunch and parking allowance
Various training on hot-trend technologies/ foreign language (English/Chinese/Japanese) and soft-skills
Fitness & sport activities: football, badminton, yoga, Aerobic
Free in-house entertainment facilities and snack
Join in various team building, company trip, year-end party, tech talks and a lot of charity events

title: Fulltime Backend Developer C#, .Net, Nodejs
description:
Mô tả công việc:
(Mức lương: Thỏa thuận)
Full-time staff will work in Da Nang office, Freelancer staff you can flexibly work anywhere.
Develop and maintain software using C# or Javascripts and its frameworks such as: .Net or NodeJS
Collaborate with cross-functional teams, the rest of the team to define and deliver new features that are well-architected and high-quality.
Code review with the team to ensure clean, readable, and testable code.
Resolve any problems existing in the system and suggest and add new features in the complete system.
Follow the best practices while developing the app and also keep everything structured and well documented. Document the project and code efficiently.
Manage the code and project on Git in order to keep in sync with other team members and managers.
Communicate with the Project Manager regarding the status of projects and suggest appropriate deadlines for new functionalities.
Code with security guidelines should always be followed.
Write unit tests for features.
Chức vụ: Nhân Viên/Chuyên Viên

Nghỉ lễ, nghỉ phép, nghỉ việc riêng có hưởng lương theo quy định nhà nước, nghỉ quốc khánh Mỹ

Cơm trưa, xăng xe, nhà ở, con nhỏ, điện thoại, nội quy, chuyên cần, lương tháng 13+KPI

Bảo hiểm xã hội đóng nguyên lương. Bảo hiểm y tế, bảo hiểm sức khỏe cho bản thân + 2 người thân (tùy cấp bậc)
(parking and transit)

Chương trình đào tạo và phát triển kỹ năng chuyên môn, kỹ năng mềm hàng năm
Vị trí thuận lợi:
Văn phòng hiện đại ngay trung tâm thành phố, view sông Hàn thơ mộng, cách nhà máy 30 phút đi ô tô
Chương trình CSR:
Chương trình từ thiện, hỗ trợ giáo dục, hỗ trợ cộng đồng hằng năm

Hội thao, Teambuilding, Ngày hội gia đình, Gala dinner,...
Ăn uống:
Cafe miễn phí, căng tin với các loại thức ăn phong phú

What you’ll bring to the table:
Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science/Information Technologies
At least 2 years of working experience in web development, developing high interactive applications in a large-scale and high-traffic projects and using Agile methodologies.
At least 2 years of hands-on working experience in .Net or NodeJS projects.
Hands-on experience with Restful AP/ Microservices
Solid knowledge and experience with PostgreSQL.
Having experience with Docker,/AWS Service is a plus.
Passion for writing great, simple, clean, and efficient code.
Proficient in authoring, editing, and presenting technical documents.
Flexible and adaptable attitude, disciplined to manage multiple responsibilities and adjust to varied environments.
Desired competencies
Good problem-solving skills
High attention to detail
Good analytical thinking
Self-study and can adapt to changes
Ability to work well as part of a team
Good at English writing and reading

title: [Iljin Diamond Vina] HR and Admin Manager (Urgent)
description:
Mô tả công việc:
(Mức lương: Thỏa thuận)
About us,
In 1987, ILJIN Diamond was the first to develop industrial synthetic diamonds in Korea through academy-industry cooperation with KIST (Korea Institute of Science and Technology). Since then, through the reinvention of its technologies, we have firmly established our position as the leading industrial diamond maker globally (in areas such as the US, Europe, Japan, China, etc.)
Going forth, by addressing the various needs of our valued customers and through continuous technological advancements, we will become a global leading company in the Advanced Materials Industry.
Iljin Diamond Vina (IDV) is a multi-million USD capital FDI Company founded in April 2020. We operate a production site (factory) located in Dong Van IV Industrial Zone – Ha Nam province, Vietnam as part of global production networks with the manufacturing processing of detailed cutting parts, parts used for drilling industries…Our Company currently is in expansion progress and we would like to attract the right talents to join our team to build a high-performing team and promote our core values as Sharing, Team-Playing, Action-oriented, Robust, and Speedy (S.T.A.R.S).
The role
HRM role plays a critical role in ensuring Iljin Diamond Vina (The Company)’s ability to attract, recruit, develop and retain capable human capital which is vital to the business’s success.
He/She designs, plans, and manages team members to implement HR-GA programs, policies such as HR overall policies, compensation, employee relations, HR reports, and general affairs services as well as health and safety programs to ensure the Company archives the targets and adheres to the approved budget.
Responsibilities
1) Responsible for end-to-end recruitment and ensuring all processes are conducted effectively, and professionally on given manpower plan, recruitment lead time, and position requirement (Operators, Engineers, Staff, Leaders, Managers); Manage on-boarding procedure, orientation training to provide best employee experience.
2) Proposes, reviews, and implements overall HR & GA policies, procedures, and SOPs to meet the business requirements and goals as well as to align HR policies and system with local Vietnamese regulations as well as the Group policies.
3) Monitor and maintain HR records and employee information on HR databases and HR software; perform labor contract management properly.
4) Administers and ensures compensation and benefits, monthly payroll administration, and statutory payments such as SI, UI, HI, and PIT.
5) Conduct employee relations function which is providing consultation, and advice to Management in terms of maintaining a positive, engaged, and high-performing team; a window person to build and promote a corporate culture based on the Group’s and IDV itself and people, and cultural values.
6) To propose and implement employee activities that cover monthly best employees, employee events, and internal cultural campaigns to boost the employee’s morale and engagement.
7) Handles labor contract management, lawful termination, and labor disputes (grievance, disciplinary action…);
8) From time to time review and make sure all general affairs services, contracts are implemented properly such as transportation, canteen, cleaning, security, stationery, and accommodation, work permits.
9) Supports management, and managers to conduct, guide, and monitor annual performance reviews, salary, and other compensation reviews to ensure a competitive advantage in the labor market.
10) Review and update the organization chart, and consult management on team structure, and job titles, job descriptions.
11) Month-end closing reports and payments for HR, GA, and EHS expenses including payment requests meet the timelines, contract management as well as proposals for any service improvement.
12) Supervise and ensure Environmental, Health, and Safety (EHS) programs are well complied with and implemented.
13) Consult, and support management as well as represents management in some particular events of dealing with local authorities, and guests.
14) Check and ensure all required reports including periodical reports, and adhoc HR reports to management and headquarters as required.
15) Perform other tasks assigned by the management.
Chức vụ: Trưởng Nhóm/Trưởng Phòng
Hình thức làm việc: Toàn thời gian
Quyền lợi được hưởng:
13rd month salary payment
Insurance
Yêu cầu bằng cấp (tối thiểu): Đại Học
Yêu cầu công việc:
Requirements
Bachelor’s degree in Human Resources Management, Business Management, Business Administration, or a related field.
Proven work experience in a Human Resources and General Affairs leading role in a production company (at least 7 years in a similar role)
Preferred skills
Good communication and interpersonal skills
Good time management and organizational skills
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
Good networking and presentation skills
Proficiency in Microsoft Office tools
A trustable leader who can lead the team.
Good command of English skills
Good sense of integrity, able to keep confidential HR information under discretion.
Additional Note
Able to perform the job under pressure, tight schedules, familiar or able to work at a production factory (Hanoi - Ha Nam) which requires daily commuting.
We support a fast, fair recruitment process. Only a short list is contacted.
Yêu cầu giới tính: Nam/Nữ
Ngành nghề: Hành chính Văn phòng,Hành Chính/Văn Phòng,Nhân Sự,Quản Trị Nhân Sự (HR)

Đại Học
Không yêu cầu

title: Lecturer, Management
description:
Overview:
RMIT VIETNAM
RMIT is a global university of technology, design and enterprise. We’re global in footprint and even more importantly, we’re global in mindset. We’re committed to making a positive impact wherever we go. The wider our reach, the deeper our connections, the greater our impact.
RMIT University Vietnam (RMIT Vietnam) is a campus of RMIT University with 700 staff and 7,000 students, in three locations, and recently awarded one of the Best Companies to work for in Asia 2020. From a media perspective RMIT Vietnam enjoys a 40% share of voice in the sector. It brings a world-class education and globalised study environment to the heart of Asia, offering programs in business, technology, communication, design, fashion and English language. It boasts an impressive range of extra-curricular activities that encourage students to innovate and network globally.
SCHOOL OF BUSINESS AND MANAGEMENT
Over the last twenty years, RMIT Vietnam’s School of Business and Management has established a reputation for excellence in business and management education, providing high quality, industry responsive programs relevant to the national and global marketplace. Our business programs offer fresh perspectives on business problems and we inspire our students to challenge, create, and think outside the box.
Department of Management (Management, Human Resources Management & Entrepreneurship, International Business, Tourism & Hospitality Management, Business Administration)
Bachelor of Business (Management)
Bachelor of Business (Human Resources Management)
Bachelor of Tourism and Hospitality Management
Bachelor of Business (International Business)
POSITION SUMMARY
As a Lecturer you will contribute to the teaching and research efforts of the school, in disciplines related to your field of expertise. Specifically, you will be responsible for carrying out teaching activities across undergraduate, Masters and Graduate Diploma programs and maintain and advance scholarly, research and/or professional capabilities. You will be expected to actively promote the programs by establishing and maintaining memberships, links and partnerships with academic, industry and professional communities.
For further information about this position, please see Position Description below.
MGMT_Lecturer, Management.pdf
OUR REQUIREMENTS
PhD in Management or equivalent relevant Doctoral qualification.
Familiarity in teaching management related subjects.
Ability to prepare and deliver programs at undergraduate and postgraduate levels, including online delivery, and the ability to produce high quality curriculum or program materials.
Ability to undertake course coordination role and to manage a varying scope of small to large programs.
Capability to work effectively with and to negotiate sensitively with students especially on issues related to effective learning.
Established track record and recognition for quality research outputs which will contribute to existing Discipline and School research areas evidenced by publications, development of new research initiatives, competitive research funding, and industry links.
Ability to build effective networks with colleagues and generate alternative funding projects through effective liaison with industry and government.
Recent and sustained performance regarding student outcomes, student experience and feedback; combined with experience and skill in a range of teaching settings.
Ability to work with external partners, industries, organisations and communities and can operate effectively to address complex issues or seek opportunities
Highly rated performance relating to student outcomes, student experience and feedback
Excellent team player
Culturally adept and agile.
BENEFITS INCLUDE
Highly competitive VND salary (plus allowances) for local candidates or attractive USD salary package (plus benefits) for expatriate candidates depending on proven track record in meeting all the key selection criteria.
Expatriate candidates: Relocation allowance and flights for dependents. School tuition support of up to US$15,000 per child annually, up to 2 children per family; private health insurance coverage for staff and family; annual health check-up; Work Permit for staff, Visa and temporary resident cards for family members
Local candidates: 13th month Tet bonus + private medical insurance (for you and your dependents) + annual health check
FURTHER INFO
As an expatriate candidate you will require a work permit to be employed in Vietnam. To qualify for a work permit you will need a PhD qualification and you will need to be able to demonstrate at least 5 years of teaching across relevant subjects in a tertiary education environment.
English is the language of teaching and communication at RMIT Vietnam. For this role, the minimum requirement is IELTS Academic 7.0 and with no band less than 6.5 (or equivalent)
NEW Information Pack - Foreign Candidates - Academic 2018.pdf
HOW TO APPLY
Please click on the ‘Apply Now’ button. With your application please include:
Curriculum Vitae/ Resume
Cover letter
A copy of your current ID
Proof of highest qualifications
Evidence of English Language Proficiency (if applicable)
Applications Close:
9 thg 2 2023 11.59 pm
RMIT University Vietnam (RMIT Vietnam) is a campus of RMIT University. RMIT Vietnam is creating an innovative research, teaching and learning culture. We are committed to providing internationally recognised high-quality education and professional training for our students, clients and members of the community. As an internationally recognised Australian university based in Asia, RMIT Vietnam is assisting in the development of human resources capability in Vietnam and the region.
https://www.rmit.edu.vn/about-us

title: Frontend Engineering Manager
Cloud engineer
description:
31-Dec-2022
Cloud engineer
Category: Information Technology Division
Job Type:
Facility: Technology
Objective
Thiết kế, triển khai và đánh giá các biện pháp sử dụng nền tảng đám mây, đảm bảo giải pháp đưa ra phù hợp với luật và chính sách bảo mật của TCB
Key accountabilities
1. Quản lý và điều hành công việc:
Phân tích nhu cầu của các đơn vị và giúp họ lựa chọn công nghệ đám mây phù hợp.
Thiết kế cho các đơn vị/ dự án trong ngân hàng về các giải pháp công nghệ dựa vào công nghệ đám mây.
Làm việc với đối tác để triển khai các giải pháp đám mây
Cân nhắc hiệu quả những rủi ro tiềm ẩn của các giải pháp công nghệ đám mây
Hỗ trợ triển khai các giải pháp đám mây một cách an toàn và bảo mật
Thực hiện kiểm tra đánh giá hiệu quả của công nghệ đám mây vào trong các giải pháp công nghệ
Thông qua việc đánh giá liên tục các mối đe dọa và lỗ hổng bảo mật trên đám mây , đưa ra các đề xuất, cải tiến và nâng cao khi cần thiết.
2. Công tác quản trị rủi ro và tuân thủ:
Nhận biết các rủi ro và phối hợp với các đơn vị liên quan để đề xuất phương pháp đo lường và giảm thiểu các rủi ro trong hoạt động.
Đảm bảo các nhóm trong bộ phận hoàn thành những cam kết về chất lượng phục vụ, tuân thủ các quy định, chính sách của Ngân hàng
Success Profile - Qualification and Experiences
1. Bằng tốt nghiệp Đại học trở lên, chuyên ngành Công nghệ thông tin
2. Kinh nghiệm công tác: 3-6 năm
Kinh nghiệm với cloud (aws/gcp)
Kinh nghiệm với hệ thống lớn
Kinh nghiệm với container/microservice/container orchestration/kubernetes (k8s)
Kinh nghiệm với configuration management (ansible/puppet), infrastructure as code (terraform/cloudformation), GitOps model
Familiar with 1 or more scripting language (bash/python). Golang is plus.
3. Trình độ ngoại ngữ: Tiếng Anh tương đương TOEIC 550 trở lên

title: Hourly Associate Lecturer/ Lecturer, Law
description:
Overview:
RMIT Vietnam
RMIT Vietnam
– a campus of RMIT University – is part of a global university of technology, design and enterprise. Our mission is to help shape the world through research, innovation, teaching and engagement and to create transformative experiences for our students, getting them ready for life and work. RMIT is a 5-Star university under the QS Stars international evaluation system and ranks in the world’s top 400 in the 2018 Academic Ranking of World Universities.
School of Business and Management
RMIT Vietnam’s School of Business and Management has established a reputation for excellence in business and management education, providing high quality, industry responsive programs relevant to the national and global marketplace. Our business programs offer fresh perspectives on business problems and we inspire our students to think, challenge and create.

We deliver work ready graduates. In today’s competitive environment, professionals need the skills to adapt to an ever changing business world. With RMIT Vietnam's close partnerships with industry, our students are engaged with some of industry’s top business people, receiving knowledge and skills aligned directly with their specific career paths. At RMIT Vietnam, we give our students the skills to address real-world business issues.
Role & key responsibilities
Undertake independent teaching into Commercial Law course at undergraduate level.
Undertake administration duties, which may include course coordination role or management of a small award program.
Adhere to the requirements of the Academic Expectations and Development Framework of RMIT Vietnam.
Key selection criteria
Having a common law background, i.e. obtained the Master or PhD degree from a university in a common law country.
Having a strong commercial law background, i.e., having strong teaching and research experience in some or all of the following fields of law: tort law, contract law, consumer law, company law, investment law, and corporate governance.
Being familiar with principles of electronic contracts and business ethics will be advantages.
Associate Lecturer: relevant Master’s degree from a recognised institution.
Lecturer: PhD or equivalent relevant doctoral qualification from a recognised institution.
Demonstrated ability to prepare and deliver high-quality courses at undergraduate level including the production of online or offline teaching activities and support materials.
Evidence of achieving course learning outcomes and positive student experiences.
To find out more
For further information about this role, please click on the Hourly Academic FAQ document below.
Hourly Academic FAQ's.pdf
Please note
English is the language of teaching and communication at RMIT Vietnam. For this role, the minimum requirement is IELTS 7.0 (with no competency less than 6.5).
Non-Vietnamese candidates must also meet the requirements of the Vietnamese Work Permit process
How to apply
Click on the ‘Apply Now’ link.

title: Full-stack .NET Developer (Azure, IoT project)
description:
Company Description

The Bosch Group is a leading global supplier of technology and services. In 2013, its roughly 281,000 associates generated sales of 46.4 billion Euros. Since the beginning of 2013, its operations have been divided into four business sectors: Automotive Technology, Industrial Technology, Consumer Goods, and Energy and Building Technology. The Bosch Group comprises Robert Bosch GmbH and its roughly 360 subsidiaries and regional companies in some 50 countries. If its sales and service partners are included, then Bosch is represented in roughly 150 countries. This worldwide development, manufacturing, and sales network is the foundation for further growth.
BGSV - Bosch Global Software Technologies Vietnam Company Limited is 100% owned subsidiary of Robert Bosch GmbH. BGSV has started its operations from 19th October, 2010 at e-Town2 in HCMC. This engineering development center will be engaged in developing embedded systems and software, mechanical design and simulation, and will provide IT (SAP Consulting, JAVA Development….) and Business Services (Finance and accounting, Economics, Purchasing, Logistics, Translations Japanese-English-Japanese, Information Security ) solutions to the Bosch group of companies globally.

Job Description

The Bosch IoT Suite, the Bosch Group’s core software platform for IoT solutions, connects more than 10 million devices – vehicles, sensors in urban and agricultural applications or gateways in buildings. You will play a significant part in a joint collaboration to build up solutions, services for multiple different projects related to Manufacturing, connected Machine Applications or Building Technologies for both internal or external stakeholders under the high-end industry standards. To get to know our IoT platform, let's dive deeper in this page: bosch.com/stories/iot-platform-like-a-bosch/
WHAT YOU WILL DO:
Understand the software requirement document and quality aspects
Make the detail design and documentation for the software components that you are in charge for
Develop cloud deployable software components (front end, backend, algorithms) based on architecture document in connected building and smart campus solution
Follow defined software development process, ensure the quality of deliverables: unit testing, sonar quality, open sources, bugs, technical debts, etc.
Report to project manager for the daily tasks and contribute to team activities e.g. innovation, ideation, fun at work…
Contribute to the CICD, DevOps activities
Continuous self-learn new technology on company learning platform either in classroom or online (internal source and Udemy)

Qualifications
Hands-on working experience in .NET with 1-5 years in designing & developing web-based applications
Be able to handle English communication (both verbal and non-verbal)
Solid knowledge of REST API, Web Service, Micro-Services and containerization technologies (Docker, Kubernetes, Springboot, etc.)
Good at web UI Programming Skills like Html5/jQuery, CSS, ReactJS, Angular
Understanding of Backend API Integration
Be familiar with developing workflow-based applications
Ability to self-learn new technology and take initiative
Experience in AWS Cloud, DevOps (Jenkins, AWS Code Commit, etc.) would be a treasure
Python programming experience, Azure pipeline or terraform is a plus

Additional Information

Why BOSCH?
Because we don't just follow trends, we create them.
Because together we turn ideas into reality, working every day to make the world of tomorrow a better place. Do you have high standards when it comes to your job? So do we. At Bosch, you will discover more than just work.
Benefits and Career Opportunities
Working in one of the Best Places to Work in Vietnam and Top 30 of the Most Innovative Companies all over the world
Join a dynamic and fast growing global company (English-speaking environment)
13th-month salary bonus + attractive performance bonus (you'll love it!) + annual performance appraisal
100% monthly salary and mandatory social insurances in 2-month probation
Onsite opportunities: short-term and long-term assignments
15++ days of annual leave + 1 day of birthday leave
Premium health insurance for employee and 02 family members
Flexible working time
Lunch and parking allowance
Various training on hot-trend technologies/ foreign language (English/Chinese/Japanese) and soft-skills
Fitness & sport activities: football, badminton, yoga, Aerobic
Free in-house entertainment facilities and snack
Join in various team building, company trip, year-end party, tech talks and a lot of charity events

title: senior front end developer
description:
Working for xspera, feels like coming home
xspera, a globally operating management consultancy, seek to increase corporate performance through digital transformation. Xingate 5.0, xspera’s digital enterprise platform developed on Microsoft’s technology and collaboration stacks, deliver powerful intra, inter, and cross-departmental solutions for immediate results at affordable costs.
xspera is seeking talented Senior Front-end Developer that will be charge of our core product, xingate 5.0 by using MS SharePoint, Process Automation (Power Automate…), MS Exchange, Microsoft Teams, MS SQL BI, and Logic App environment that combines and utilizes the important components of leading-edge collaboration and communication solutions with information management and business intelligence for a “state-of-the-art» corporate management.
With our international team, we change the way companies collaborate and communicate. You
are a big part of that change. Together with the xingate 5.0 stakeholders and the product
development team, you work directly on a tangible end-product.
Key responsibilities
Develop new user-facing features and test across multiple browsers, platforms, and devices, including smartphones and tablets
Ensure the technical feasibility of UI/UX designs
Optimize applications for maximum speed and scalability
Together with Back-end to assure that all user input is validated
Provide custom solutions including complex process automation or App add-ins by leveraging JavaScript, jQuery, HTML, CSS, XSL and XML, C#, and .NET Core
Support the back-end developers with relevant coding and troubleshooting
Maintain graphic standards and branding throughout the product’s interface
Stay up to date on emerging technologies
Be responsible to accurate timing estimates on the tasks.
Requirements
Qualifications
Bachelor’s Degree in computer science, management information systems, or related field preferred, (or comparable work experience)
English certificate of TOEIC 550 or equivalent
Experience
3+ years’ solid experience in software development worked as a Frontend Developer
with React.js or/and with Angular
3+ years’ experience in JavaScript/ jQuery, Ajax etc. performance optimization in Web
Development.
Experience in both responsive design patterns like bootstrap frameworks and crossbrowser
compatibility issues and ways to work around them.
Proficient understanding SharePoint concepts such as Master pages, Page Layouts, Content Types, Lists, & Libraries.
Understanding of code versioning tools such as Visual studio, TFS, Azure DevOps
Basic knowledge for SharePoint On-Premises and SharePoint Online, Cloud, Office 365, SharePoint site branding and User Experience (UX) methodologies including HTML5, CSS3
Good knowledge in Angular JS, Angular, React JS, Redux, Redux form, office UI fabric react, SEO, Require JS, Workflow.
Nice to have knowledge in Rest API, SOAP, JSOM, CSOM,
Knowledge and Skills
Experience in writing and carrying out unit test, and providing developer support
An ability to work in a fast paced & dynamic environment with short deadlines, interruptions & multiple tasks / projects occurring at once
Being able to work collaboratively & cooperatively with multiple infrastructure providers in support of technology solutions
Experience in Agile software development methodologies, especially Scrum, DevOps…
Confident to communicate in English environment
Why Work at xspera
Above market salary compensation, including 13-month pay
Quarterly and yearly performance bonus compensation
Annual performance reviews
Personal development, training, and creative freedom
Ability to participate in customer projects in EU, US & Asia
Work in a global team with highly skilled and motivated people
Spectacular company trips
About xspera
xspera focus on the business goals of our customers. We deliver solutions which help customers achieve their business goals faster. Our enterprise portal, xingate 5.0, adapts quickly to our client’s corporate structures reducing their process costs in many areas by as much as 30% -60% through greater transparency, digitization, and process automation. Join xspera today and be part of the digital world of tomorrow!

title: Manager - Data Services Delivery VN
description:
Primary objectives:
Work with customers and the wider Rackspace organizations on re-thinking and re-designing IT Data landscapes using cloud-native technologies
Excellent technical architecture skills, design and deliver innovative Proof of Concepts for customers.
Support with the enhancement of delivery capabilities across the India and Vietnam delivery teams
Build cloud data solutions, big data platform services, serverless architectures, Hadoop ecosystem, DW/DM, NoSQL databases, analytics services on public cloud platforms and security.
Design and write excellent, fully tested code to build ETL /ELT data pipelines, BI models and dashboard and on a public Cloud platform.
Participate in deep architectural discussions to build confidence and ensure customer success when building new solutions and migrating existing data applications on the AWS, Azure, GCP, Snowflake platforms
Implement product features and refine specifications with our Data scientists, Data Analysts and Data Architects
Lead and deliver workshops, ideation and strategy sessions for customers working to solve their business use cases with innovative technology solutions
Evangelize the cloud-native paradigm through the delivery of blogs, customer presentations and public speaking engagements.
Mentor and train other architects/Engineer within the wider Rackspace community on modern Big data and cloud-native Data Technologies.
Basic Qualifications:
Highly technical and analytical, possessing 12 or more years of Data warehouse and/or Analytics Systems development and deployment experience, IT systems and engineering experience, security, and compliance experience, etc.
You have some exposure on managing DataOps team, managed services teams along with Professional services team of 30+ resources.
Minimum of 5 years of experience in architecture of modern data Warehousing platforms using technologies such as Big Data and Cloud.
Self-starter, highly aggressive and motivated to provide the highest possible level of responsiveness and performance from a team of people.
Large scale design, implementation, and operations of OLTP, OLAP, DW and NoSQL data storage technologies such as SQL Server, Azure SQL, Azure Synapse Analytics, PostgreSQL, CosmosDB, RedisCache, Azure Data Lake Store, Hadoop, Hive, MySQL, Neo4j, Cassandra, HBase.
Experience working within an agile development process (Scrum, Kanban, etc)
Familiarity with CI/CD concepts
Strong verbal and written communications skills are a must, as well as the relationship-building skills to work effectively across internal and external organizations and virtual teams.
Experience with one or more public cloud Data Analytics suite of services including, real-time streaming services, data processing services, SQL query engines, ETL services and visualization services.
Required experience on one or more of AWS, Azure and Google Cloud Platform.
Knowledge or hands-on experience with data visualization and/or data sciences.
Track record of implementing cloud data services in a variety of business environments such as large enterprises and start-ups.
Preferred Qualifications:
Technical degrees in computer science, software engineering
Deep understanding of data architecture and application.
Hands on experience as a database, data warehouse, big data/analytics developer/administrator, or data scientist.
Working knowledge of modern software development practices and technologies such as agile methodologies and DevOps.
Hands on experience leading large-scale global database, data warehousing and analytics projects.
Cloud certifications such as AWS Solutions Architect, Developer, GCP Professional Data Engineer or Microsoft Data / AI certifications.
As part of your role, you will:
Manage team of 15+ resources including Professional services team, DataOps team, managed services teams.
Deliver high-quality work to customers as part of consulting engagements that can be delivered through workshops, presentations, or solutions architecture designs.
Work in close collaboration with other architects, technical consultants and professional services teams within Rackspace and customer’s teams
Work with customers across multiple regions depending on customer locations.

#DataServicesAPJ
#Vietnam

#SeniorManagement
#Azure #AWS #GCP #Snowflake

About Rackspace Technology
We are the multicloud solutions experts. We combine our expertise with the world’s leading technologies — across applications, data and security — to deliver end-to-end solutions. We have a proven record of advising customers based on their business challenges, designing solutions that scale, building and managing those solutions, and optimizing returns into the future. Named a best place to work, year after year according to Fortune, Forbes and Glassdoor, we attract and develop world-class talent. Join us on our mission to embrace technology, empower customers and deliver the future.

More on Rackspace Technology
Though we’re all different, Rackers thrive through our connection to a central goal: to be a valued member of a winning team on an inspiring mission. We bring our whole selves to work every day. And we embrace the notion that unique perspectives fuel innovation and enable us to best serve our customers and communities around the globe. We welcome you to apply today and want you to know that we are committed to offering equal employment opportunity without regard to age, color, disability, gender reassignment or identity or expression, genetic information, marital or civil partner status, pregnancy or maternity status, military or veteran status, nationality, ethnic or national origin, race, religion or belief, sexual orientation, or any legally protected characteristic. If you have a disability or special need that requires accommodation, please let us know.

title: Lecturer, International Business
description:
Overview:
RMIT VIETNAM
RMIT is a global university of technology, design and enterprise. We’re global in footprint and even more importantly, we’re global in mindset. We’re committed to making a positive impact wherever we go. The wider our reach, the deeper our connections, the greater our impact.
RMIT University Vietnam (RMIT Vietnam) is a campus of RMIT University with 700 staff and 7,000 students, in three locations, and recently awarded one of the Best Companies to work for in Asia 2020. From a media perspective RMIT Vietnam enjoys a 40% share of voice in the sector. It brings a world-class education and globalised study environment to the heart of Asia, offering programs in business, technology, communication, design, fashion and English language. It boasts an impressive range of extra-curricular activities that encourage students to innovate and network globally.
SCHOOL OF BUSINESS AND MANAGEMENT
Over the last twenty years, RMIT Vietnam’s School of Business and Management has established a reputation for excellence in business and management education, providing high quality, industry responsive programs relevant to the national and global marketplace. Our business programs offer fresh perspectives on business problems and we inspire our students to challenge, create, and think outside the box.
Department of Management (Management, Human Resources Management & Entrepreneurship, International Business, Tourism & Hospitality Management, Business Administration)
Bachelor of Business (Management)
Bachelor of Business (Human Resources Management)
Bachelor of Tourism and Hospitality Management
Bachelor of Business (International Business)
POSITION SUMMARY
As a Lecturer you will contribute to the teaching and research efforts of the school, in disciplines related to your field of expertise. Specifically, you will be responsible for carrying out teaching activities across undergraduate, Masters and Graduate Diploma programs and maintain and advance scholarly, research and/or professional capabilities. You will be expected to actively promote the programs by establishing and maintaining memberships, links and partnerships with academic, industry and professional communities.
For further information about this position, please see Position Description below
Please see full job description here
MGMT_Lecturer, International Business_June 2019.pdf
OUR REQUIREMENTS
PhD in International Business or related Doctoral qualification.
Emerging track record and recognition for quality research outputs with the specialist fields of international business related areas, research initiatives and competitive research funding is desirable.
Previous teaching experience in the above areas.
Industry experience.
Well established and consistent internationally ranked publication record for Lecturer appointment.
Highly rated performance relating to student outcomes, student experience and feedback
Excellent team player
Culturally adept and agile.
BENEFITS INCLUDE
Highly competitive VND salary (plus allowances) for local candidates or attractive USD salary package (plus benefits) for expatriate candidates depending on proven track record in meeting all the key selection criteria.
Expatriate candidates: Relocation allowance and flights for dependents. School tuition support of up to US$15,000 per child annually, up to 2 children per family; private health insurance coverage for staff and family; annual health check-up; Work Permit for staff, Visa and temporary resident cards for family members
Local candidates: 13th month Tet bonus + private medical insurance (for you and your dependents) + annual health check
FURTHER INFO
As an expatriate candidate you will require a work permit to be employed in Vietnam. To qualify for a work permit you will need a PhD qualification and you will need to be able to demonstrate at least 5 years of teaching across relevant subjects in a tertiary education environment.
English is the language of teaching and communication at RMIT Vietnam. For this role, the minimum requirement is IELTS Academic 7.0 and with no band less than 6.5 (or equivalent)
NEW Information Pack - Foreign Candidates - Academic 2018.pdf
HOW TO APPLY
Please click on the ‘Apply Now’ button. With your application please include:
Curriculum Vitae/ Resume
Cover letter
A copy of your current ID
Proof of highest qualifications
Evidence of English Language Proficiency (if applicable)
Applications Close:
9 thg 2 2023 11.59 pm

We are committed to providing internationally recognised high-quality education and professional training for our students, clients and members of the community. As an internationally recognised Australian university based in Asia, RMIT Vietnam is assisting in the development of human resources capability in Vietnam and the region.

title: Senior Public Affairs Manager
description:
Develop and execute strategic plans, programs, communications and stories that deliver high impact results focused across 5 key areas: Driving Reputation and visual Identity; Storytelling; Media Relationships; Proactively Managing Issues; Engaging Employees.
Closely work with Vietnam management teams across divisions, Global Marketing and External Affairs (GMEA), APAC regional, Business and corporate Headquarter Public Affairs, to achieve desired outcomes.
Authority as Senior Manager, Public Affairs, Vietnam:
In coordination with business leaders and reputation champion team, develop and implement public relations programs with unified, strategic, and purposeful approach, consistent with the organization's overall public relations strategy.
Implement impactful public relations, citizenship/sustainability programs that protect and enhance the organization’s reputation; align; and support business growth (Nutrition, Medical Device, Diagnostics, Medicines, Cardiovascular).
Own a strong network of stakeholders, reporters, media influencers with deep understanding local media landscape and industry in order to shape effective programs with high resonance, relevancy, impact.
Ensure storytelling and messaging appropriate, effective, and impactful to intended audience in all developed communication materials, speeches, articles, press releases, public statements while accurate and consistent with the organization’s overall public relations strategy.
Anticipate and build proactive plan to mitigate more complex issues to ensure mitigation and all communications are accurate and appropriate.
Drive to action and elevate commitment across divisions, leaders and employees with Visual Identity implementation plan for on-brand consistency in all materials, channels, touchpoints.
Geographically, this role has authority over Vietnam (under direction of Public Affairs Director of Vietnam) – one of Abbott’s key priority countries and markets.
The incumbent must be able to think strategically and provide thoughtful counsel to a broad range of internal and external contacts across all levels of management. Role will work in close partnership with Business Advisory Council (BAC), senior division leaders and contacts in Asia Pacific regional, GMEA, Business and Corporate Public Affairs, Cross functions, and Sustainability & Citizenship to create and execute the annual PA/PR strategic plan.
Core Job Responsibilities
Storytelling: Deliver impactful external visibility for Abbott through corporate storytelling. Results should center on corporate / enterprise stories, premier employer/employee stories, sustainability/citizenship stories, and reputation building stories. Work with the Public Affairs Director, Vietnam in the development and execution of an ongoing reputation building and stakeholder management programs in Vietnam for all divisions or businesses.
Driving Reputation and Identity Building Efforts – Deliver communications across Vietnam that will build Abbott’s competitive advantage, position. Convey stories about Abbott’s innovation in Vietnam.
Tracking and managing Reputation and Identity building implementation and metrics. Ensure all leaders, divisions committed – with dashboard and implementation plan tracking in place.
Scan and target opportunities for corporate reputation recognition / awards / executive visibility.
Engaging Employees: Help shape employee communications by integrating Reputation and Visual identity Building strategy (approximately 2,500+ Abbott employees) in Vietnam. Work with Vietnam leadership on strategic enterprise-wide employee communication plan and its roll out to increase the understanding of Abbott’s corporate brand.
Proactively anticipate issues and build mitigation plan: Work with Vietnam leadership and cross-division Reputation building team to anticipate and identify potential issues related to reputation and develop proactive action plans to address them, either neutralizing/keeping the company out of coverage, or ensuring Abbott message is delivered in coverage when desired. Ensure key contacts and key spokespeople in Vietnam understand proactive plans and actions when required.
Management Responsibilities
The Senior Manager reports to the Public Affairs Director, Vietnam. This role works in a matrixed way with others in Vietnam, Regional, Business and HQ Corporate Public Affairs.
Ideal Background
Bachelor's degree – preferably in English, Journalism, or another communication-related major. Public Relations/International relations degree preferred (from a reputed school preferred).
> 8 years of experience in communications environments, including public relations, corporate communications departments, and journalism. Multinational experience with a Healthcare, Pharma, technology, food/FMCG company preferred.
Proven record in managing media and editor relations; stakeholder relations; business, and corporate communications; and issues/crisis management in a collaboration-oriented environment
Experience in working in a cross-functional and global stakeholders and in corporate reputation mindset with proven success in a fast-paced and results-oriented environment.
Understanding of Vietnam market dynamics and U.S. business practices necessary.
Fluency in English and Vietnamese, both written and verbal, required.
Required Skills
Self-motivated, creative, understanding and passion for communications
Strong communication skills - both written and verbal - with the ability to present ideas in a clear, sharp, and concise way
Strong influencing skills to engage, drive to action with complexity of strategic partners, stakeholders, champion team members, leadership team members.
Excellent team player with ability to motivate and influence internal resources
Strong project management and coordination skills
Excellent and efficient organizing skills to ensure the keeping of accurate records and meaningful information for reporting and evaluation.
Proven ability to work on own initiative, meet deadlines, multi-task and work well under pressure
Public Affairs Competencies
Communication Skills
Composure
Dealing with Ambiguity
Judgement
Sense of urgency / speed of action
Collaborative, results orientation

description:
Overview:
RMIT VIETNAM
RMIT is a global university of technology, design and enterprise. We’re global in footprint and even more importantly, we’re global in mindset. We’re committed to making a positive impact wherever we go. The wider our reach, the deeper our connections, the greater our impact.

Bachelor of Business (Logistics and Supply Chain Management)
Bachelor of Business (Digital Business)
OUR REQUIREMENTS
When you join our Digital Marketing Team as either a Lecturer or Senior Lecturer, you will bring your expert knowledge, education and experience to add significant value and impact to the teaching, research and industry engagement related activities involved in this role. As an academic member of staff, you can expect to team across undergraduate and post graduate programs whilst developing your own scholarly, research and professional capabilities. You will actively promote the program through establishing and maintaining networks and partnerships with academic, industry and professional communities (locally and internationally).
Lecturer, Digital Marketing (HCM).Oct 2018.pdf
Key selection criteria
PhD or equivalent relevant Doctoral qualification.
Expertise in fields related to digital marketing; social media and mobile marketing, digital content creation, marketing intelligence and digital analytics through publications, development of new research initiatives, competitive research funding, and industry links.
Ability to prepare and deliver programs at undergraduate and postgraduate levels, including online delivery, and the ability to produce high quality curriculum or program materials.
Industry experience is desirable.
Highly rated performance relating to student outcomes, student experience and feedback
Strong team player
Culturally adept and agile.
BENEFITS INCLUDE
Highly competitive VND salary (plus allowances) for local candidates or attractive USD salary package (plus benefits) for expatriate candidates depending on proven track record in meeting all the key selection criteria.
Expatriate candidates: Relocation allowance and flights for dependents. School tuition support of up to US$15,000 per child annually, up to 2 children per family; private health insurance coverage for staff and family; annual health check-up; Work Permit for staff, Visa and temporary resident cards for family members
Local candidates: 13th month Tet bonus + private medical insurance (for you and your dependents) + annual health check.
20 days annual leave plus 5 days paid leave Xmas closure, plus public holidays and 10 days paid sick leave.
Support and guidance from experienced Mobility Advisor to assist in work permit and visa application together with relocation to and settling into living and working in Vietnam.
FURTHER INFO
As an expatriate candidate you will require a work permit to be employed in Vietnam. To qualify for a work permit you will need a PhD qualification and you will need to be able to demonstrate at least 5 years of teaching across relevant subjects in a tertiary education environment.
English is the language of teaching and communication at RMIT Vietnam. For this role, the minimum requirement is IELTS Academic 7.0 and with no band less than 6.5 (or equivalent)

DevOps Engineer (Continuous Integration)
description:

Working in the most complex Automotive tool chain system, your contribution is to increase the engineering efficiency and precision in SDLC of Automotive industry.
Automate, administer and manage the overall Linux based infrastructure and services which includes deployment, configuration and management of Linux system
Builds, installs, configures, analyzes, tunes, and troubleshoots systems to achieve optimum performance levels
Monitors and analyzes resource usage to recommend/develop enhancements to system capabilities and performance
Resolves difficult system problems and provides consultation
Chức vụ: Nhân Viên/Chuyên Viên

13th-month bonus + yearly performance bonus + annual salary appraisal
Premium health insurance for employee + 2 family members
16++ days of paid leave per year

Bachelor's degree or equivalent in Computer Science, Information Systems, Engineering, or another related field

Familiar with Python or Groovy for automation script to make system more efficiency
Familiar with Linux-Windows in Bash script
